122111.content:
No one said anything, all of them silent as they watched the eccentric inventor continue to scribble his notes, while the blonde Mrs. Beauregarde continued chewing like a cow. Everyone wanted to know what was next up in the gum, or even more, what was in store for Scarlett.

The interested look on her face was an indication that the next course was coming up, verbally confirmed when Mrs. Beauregarde said, "Oh my, the second course is coming up."

"What is it Mother?" asked Violet, her curiosity once again getting the best of her.

"Pork sandwich?" suggested Mike.

"No, Spaghetti and Meatballs," said Grandpa Joe.

"Bull," said Mr. Salt.

"Goose with all the trimmings," said Veruca.

"No, no it's not any of those." Scarlett waved her hand trying to get the rest of the tour group to quiet down, their chatter distracting her from identifying the mysterious flavor. "It's, It's, *gasp* roast beef with baked potato." Her eyes lit up in wonder again as she looked towards Mr. Wonka. Disbelief filled them at what she was tasting. "I can actually taste the crispy skin of the potato and melted butter that slathers it. My word, and the roast beef is so... hmmmm... juicy as if it was made fresh and tenderized to the perfect level."

Scarlett's description was making the older men drool, their stomach's craving for the fantasy meal. They tried their best to conceal their desires, trying to mask it with confusion and wonder as to what else the little stick had in store.

"Mr. Wonka this is incredible, with this gum you could substitute a meal," cried Scarlett as the taste tickled her tongue.

"That's the idea!" said Mr. Wonka. "Hopefully it will make you feel like you've eaten a meal."

"Oh it does, it does, I feel as if I'm actually enjoying a supper. How did you do this?"

"I don't reveal my recipes Mrs. Beauregarde, but I'm so excited to see my gum behaving."

"You have yourself a capital product, one that could make you wealthy beyond your dreams," said Mr. Salt.

"You could get the Noble Peace Prize for this Mr. Wonka," said Mr. Teevee.

"This gum could end world hunger, couldn't it Mr. Wonka?" asked Charlie.

"You've seen my goal Mr. Buckett, well done," Wonka said with a creepy smile that was supposed to show pride, but instead was only awkward.

"Hmmmm," Scarlett moaned in disappointment, "the roast beef is going away. I guess this course is coming to an end."

"Keep chewing mother, the Beauregardes could be the first family ever to have a chewing gum meal. Another victory for our family," Violet cried out in delight.

"That's right honey,we Beauregardes have to stay on our toes to keep up with the competition." Scarlett winked at her daughter before returning her attention to the gum. "I wonder what the last course is," she said with delight, anticipation building as the last of the second course faded.

Wonka suddenly realized where she was at and pleaded, "Mrs. Beauregarde spit that gum out now!"

"I've come this far, I don't intend to stop now," she said with arrogance.

"No, you don't understand, the next course is where the gum fails. Please stop now."

It was too late, "Oh my, it's..."
122111.title: Keep on Chewing Mrs.B

choices: She can't, the gum is too good
Scarlett's will prevails and she spits it out.
1221111.content:
"BLUEBERRY PIE AND ICE CREAM!" Scarlett excitedly replied as the last course began. The dessert had always been Scarlett's favorite part of a meal, ever since she was a little girl. Growing up in the south had exposed her to various pies and cobblers, and Scarlett has nearly become overweight from her overzealous sampling. Pie had always been her favorite, especially cherry, but the pie in this gum was quickly gaining high favor. "It feels like I'm chewing an actual pie Mr. Wonka, the crispy crust, the intense fruit pie filling, and warm soft crumbs are all here. How did you do this?" Scarlett's eyes were wide with excitement and wonder at the marvel in her mouth.

"I can't tell you that Mrs. Beauregarde, but please I beg you spit the gum out now!"

"With this amazing flavor, I could chew all day. This taste, this gum, it's amazing... it's life changing."

"Oh it will be..." Wonka said with a gloom knowing that the part she was on was where the test often failed.

"Hmmmmm, so good, oooh I'm starting to feel full. You've definitely got a meal here Mr. Wonka," Scarlett said again as her stomach began to feel slightly bloated, the meal might have been doing too good of a job.

"Oh you have no Idea," said Mr. Wonka.

"What's happening to her nose?" asked Veruca, her eyes steepled in mock concern at the sight of her rival's mother.

Everyone turned their attention towards Scarlett, the blonde now feeling awkward as their faces conformed to shock, confusion, and in a few... glee.

"What? What is it?" Scarlett asked as she crossed her eyes to attempt to see the change, which was a slight dark blue tint forming at the tip of her nose. The small dot began to expand, forming a smudge that enveloped the bridge of her nose, before painting her nostrils.

"Mother, your whole nose is... purple."

"It's turning blue," commented Mr. Salt.

"Mother, you're turning violet!!!!" screamed her daughter, fear starting to etch itself into her face as she watched the horrible color spread from her mother's nose to the center of her forehead.

"Don't be silly Violet," Scarlett said with a nervous laugh, the concern obvious in wavering voice. "i'm sure it's just some type of dust from the factory, or something like that." The blue was now diverging, traveling along her forehead to opposite sides before majestically flooding down her cheeks, her ample white skin being overrun by the deep hue of the blue.

"No mother I'm not being silly, you're really turning blue!!!!" screamed Violet.

Scarlett would have nothing of it, "Violet stop this, it's unbecoming of you." The arrogant mother was chewing away, the blue now traveling down her lower cheeks towards the tip of her chin and painting her entire face a lovely shade of blue. Her ears followed shortly after as the color wrapped around the side of her head and flooded over her scalp, seeping into the pores towards her hair follicles that for now remained bright blonde.

"Mrs. Beauregarde, Violet isn't kidding, you are turning blue," Charlie politely said as he looked at her with concern. The naive woman just continued to mash the gum, the blueberry taste (he assumed) was still strong.

"You're as blue as your shirt," said Veruca.

"Alright now this is just annoying. You kids need to stop this prank now and let Mr. Wonka continue the tour!" Scarlett continued chewing as the blue finished her head, with the exception of her hair, as it covered her entire neck.

"Oh I don't think we will continue the tour quite yet," said Mr. Wonka as he saw the traveling blue color move along the top of her shoulders before it disappeared underneath her shirt.

"What's that supposed to mean?" asked Scarlett.

"Oh I think you'll get the picture soon enough," he replied with a coy smile as he began jotting additional notes down. He speculated by now that the blue had easily swarmed over her upper torso and back as it worked to change the pigment in her entire core. It wouldn't be long before it moved to her hands and he just stared at the poor woman, her ignorance to listen to reason had led to this.

"Uh huh cute Wonka. Listen let's just get on with the tour, so we can win the grand prize."

"I'm sorry, but that won't be possible for you much longer Mrs. Beauregarde. You're going to be in a position very soon, that will make walking, or for that matter moving, quite impossible for you."

"Are you threatening me Mr. Wonka?" The poor woman was indeed stubborn, and oblivious to the changes occurring. The blue emerging from her under her sleeve, suggested she would soon realize the truth.

"No, but your actions have consequences, which you can probably see now."

"I don't know what planet you're from, but here on Earth it's impossible for me to see my face," Scarlett said, as she placed her hands on her hips. The gesture, combined with her gum chewing, reminded Wonka, and a few of the other tourists, of a Jersey girl, which brought a chuckle to the inventor.

"Gasp, Mother your hands," cried out Violet.

Her daughter's comment got her attention. Scarlett stared down at her hands and gasped as she watched the blue travel over the top of her hands and wrap it's way around the tips of her fingers, making sure not to miss an inch of white on her skin. As if she thought it was a dream, Scarlett pinched her skin, hoping to wake from this nightmare. "Owww" she cried out. It was real and not a dream. Her eyes filled with fear, and in horror she watched the palms of her hands change color, her wrists and biceps following suit as the color traveled back towards her torso.

"MY HANDS!" Scarlett cried in frustration. "They're, they're..."

"They're blue, like I said," replied Violet.

"I don't suspect that's all that's blue," said Mr. Salt with a snide remark.

Violet shot the man an evil look, but Scarlett was too preoccupied with her changing color to react. She pulled the track suit from her body and looked down to see her beautiful body a similar shade to her hands. Ironically her boobs, in all there spectacular glory, looked very similar to how her entire body would soon look. Scarlett released her shirt and pulled her track pants from her body, perhaps in a futile gesture of hope that the gum's strange side effect had been contained to just her body. No such luck, her entire lower body was blue. The only thing still it's original color, was her platinum blonde hair. That is until, the gum invaded her follicles and began to dye the roots a sky blue color that traveled up the shaft.

"Oh mother, your gorgeous hair. It's turning blue too!"

Scarlett grabbed a clump of her hair and brought it to her face, her eyes growing wider (if that was possible), as she watched her beautiful locks darken from bright blonde to sky blue. "WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?" she cried out in fear as she released her hair and stared at Wonka.

"I told you I hadn't quite gotten it right. It's the blueberry dessert that always goes wrong, and I've been trying to perfect it for a while now. I'm terribly sorry, but I warned you this would happen. Though I've never seen the effects on an adult before, so maybe you can still avoid your fate as a blueberry if you spit it out now.

Scarlett looked at Wonka with fear, the arrogant woman still chewing away like a mindless cow. What would she do?
1221111.title: A Classic Blueberry Pie

choices: That's it Violet keep going!
12211111.content:
Scarlett stood there still chewing the gum, her eyes fixated on her dull blue colored hands that glowed brilliantly in the light. The transformation she had undergone, seemed to have been too much for the poor woman, her beautiful body soon to change in ways she never imagined.

"Mother, didn't you hear Mr. Wonka? Spit the gum out now!" commanded Violet.

Her daughter's voice breached her mindless chewing, bringing her consciousness back to a level where she could actually acknowledge the others around her.

"What?" she asked between a chew, her stupor preventing her from catching any of the past five minutes.

"The gum Mrs. Beauregarde, you need to spit it out," said Grandpa Joe.

“Why?” she asked in confusion. The very thought of getting rid of such a great tasting concoction was incredibly ridiculous. Surely they all were daft, to suggest she end what was perhaps the greatest taste sensation she had ever experienced.

Alarmed looks filled the groups’ faces, many confused at Scarlett’s sudden change in attitude. Did she really not remember what this candy had done to her?

“Why?” asked Violet in surprise? “Because it turned you blue, mother!” Violet shouted. “Why would you want to keep chewing something that turned your body blue?”

“Blue?” She looked at the hand in front of her, moving it around to validate that the odd colored appendage indeed belonged to her. Fear struck her again, realization finally donning on her that the she might be in trouble. Yet for some reason, she didn't care.

Everyone stood confused, many fearful at the fate their fellow contestant was falling in to. While many certainly didn’t care for Scarlett, and her rude behavior, they certainly hadn’t wished for something like this to happen. To tell the truth many never thought such a thing was plausible, the notion of a woman transforming into a blueberry merely falling on the level of an odd fantasy or bedtime story. Yet here it was happening, and for a few people in the group, this punishment was fascinating, while other found it terrifying.
Wonka was a mixture of both, he had been trying to address the blueberrification effects for years now, but this was the first case in which someone actually experienced memory loss. His hand worked furiously as he recorded his observations and thoughts, sometimes cramping in the process from too much stress. What could have caused such an effect that had been absent in all the other contestants. Was it because she was older than the previous subjects? No some of his Loompas were far older than the lovely blue beauty before him, however they were also Loompas and their genetics were different from those of a typical human. That answer eluded Wonka, but he still tried to figure out the problem, recalling when it happened.

Lost in thought Wonka nearly missed the emotions on Charlie’s face. The poor boy had a look that was a mixture of wonder and fear, but there was also something else… concern. This poor orphan boy, who had his share of hard knocks, had been ridiculed by the other contestants, constantly harassed by the spoiled children that made up the rest of the group. Violet in particular had practically tormented the boy with verbal abuse, her competitive nature driving her to say unruly things to dishevel her opponents. Yet here he was, showing concern not for the arrogant Mrs. Beauregarde, but more so for Violet, who deserve no such kindness. Perhaps Charlie could somehow relate to the nightmare of a parent turning blue, or maybe it was something else Wonka didn’t understand. Regardless, he said nothing as he returned to his observations.

Grandpa Joe like Charlie mirrored concern, his focused on Mrs. Beauregarde. The other men, looked at the poor women with a different look, one that suggested lust and inappropriate fantasies that didn't fit in with the theme of the factory. Perhaps it was his imagination, but it seemed like Scarlett turning blue may have been making the adult men… hot. Wonka had not felt such emotions, his life merely involved in his work and bringing joy, but somehow he couldn’t help but find it fascinating at what he was seeing. He had to stifle a laugh, as he returned to his people watching, his gaze eventually settling on Veruca.

The arrogant brat, smiled coyly at the changing Mrs. Beauregarde, perhaps enjoying the incredible misfortune that had befallen her. Wonka couldn’t read her mind, but believed Veruca was already scheming how to take advantage of this accident. Violet’s mother turning blue, would destroy the pillar of strength that her rival used. The vulnerability Violet would have, would deeply soften her, allowing Veruca to manipulate her like putty. If Wonka didn’t throw her off the tour for lack of a chaperone, Veruca was sure that she could lure the vulnerable Violet into an "accident" that could easily occur in this strange factory. Yet there was something more happening in her mind, something she couldn’t quite explain.Before she could pursue that thought, her attention focused on her rival. Poor Violet was staring at her mother, eyes wide with fear, at the pathetic site she was becoming.

Violet couldn’t believe what was happening to her mother. How could such a strong figure like Scarlett Beauregarde, become so, so helpless and weak? This women was the one who had trained Violet to show no weakness, no give, yet there she stood vulnerable to ridicule of the other groups. Violet couldn't let her mother fall so easily, the Beauregarde pride and honor could not be snatched so easily. “Mother please, you have to get a hold of yourself. Spit it out now, or something worse might happen to you!” She had meant the words to come out stronger that, but she was only ten, still a child, who hadn't learned total control over her emotions. Sadness and fear combined in her, tears starting to well up at the thought of losing the only person she could trust on the tour. Scarlett stood their transfixed on her hand, still unable to believe that it belonged to her all the while chewing the blasted candy that had caused this. Why wouldn’t she listen?

“Mr. Wonka why won’t she respond?” she asked, hope latching on to her words in that the mad inventor would be offer a solution.

“I’m not sure Ms. Beauregarde. This is the first time I’ve ever seen this happen, no one has ever gone into a daze like this.”

“WHAT!?” she cried out. “Why is this happening to her?”

“I can’t really explain at the moment. My guess is that your mother is older than the previous… testers.”

“What does that have to do with anything?” Mr. Teevee asked.

Before he could answer Violet screamed at her mother once more, another attempt to try and breach her ignorant state. “Mother please, you’re a Beauregarde and Beauregardes don’t give up. Focus, get your head in the game! Please... please do it for me, Violet.”

“Violet…?” Scarlett asked in confusion, apparently she was starting to come back to the reality at hand.
12211111.title: She can't, the gum is too good

choices: Panic & Preparation
Last minute thinking saves the day
122111111.content:
“Yes Mother it’s me Violet. Listen to me, you have to spit the gum out now, or what is happening to you will only get worse. “

“Worse…” the fogginess in her mind was starting to lift, Scarlett’s sense of reality was coming back. The glassed over look that filled her face was slowly being replaced with the vigor, vigilance, and determination it once held before her foolish mistake of challenging Wonka. At least it was, until she saw her hand, for real this time, and the strength once again melted, her eyes growing wide with terror. “My hand, what… what happened to me?” Apparently her stupor had wiped her short term memory, another fascinating side effect that for the time remained unanswered.

“The gum Mrs. Beauregarde, it turned your entire skin blue,” said Grandpa Joe.

“What? It did?” she inspected her body again and gasped as she rediscovered her altered appearance.

“Your hair as well mother,” Violet reminded her, which resulted in Scarlett looking at sky blue locks once more.

“Mr. Wonka what do I do?” Scarlett asked in shock.

“I suggest spitting the gum out first Mrs. Beauregarde,” he said timidly as he realized her consciousness was coming back.

“Yes mother spit it out now!” yelled Violet.

“What good would that do now that I’m… blue,” she said, the last word with disgust, as if the change in skin was some sort of disease that made her worthless. It wasn't hear body's fault that she had ignored Wonka's warning, she didn't have to chew the gum.

“It could stop you from getting any bluer you crazy…” began Mike.

“That’s enough Mike,” said Mr. TeeVee angrily.

Scarlett flashed an angry glance at Mike, the threat they once held now diluted by the ridiculous color she now sported. A smirk appeared on Mike's face, a challenge issued to show that Scarlett was no longer as mighty as she once thought. Merely minutes ago that stare that she had spent years perfecting would strike fear into the masses, but now were overshadowed by the her deep blue skin. The fact that she still was chewing like mindless cow, took even more threat out of the cocky woman.

“Mrs. Beauregarde,” called Wonka, “you’ve proven your point. I think you should listen to your daughter’s words and spit the gum out now.”

“Please mother, do it now. “

Violet’s weakness was showing, the iron wall defense and fearless composure melting away as her concern for her mother poured out. Scarlett was both disgusted and moved by the love her daughter was showing her. Surely Violet knew not to let others see her vulnerability, but yet seeing her child struggling to be strong for her was something she couldn’t ignore. Those pleading eyes, the beautiful eyes she had inherited from Scarlett, found their mark in her heart. She had to do it, she had to spit the gum out to show. She could still be strong, but it had to be on her own terms.

“I suppose I can stop now,” said Scarlett as she feigned annoyance with a dramatic sigh as she placed her hands on her hips. Slowly she moved the gum towards her lips, the sweet taste and her reluctance to end chewing following it. Just as she was about to spit it out, Scarlett’s eyes grew wide, the flavor was intensifying, the sweet juice pouring more into her mouth with a ferocity she had never experienced. The amazing release of juice had once again captivated her, the response being her tongue pulling the gum back in like a fishing line pulls in a fish. Scarlett’s mouth redoubled it’s efforts to mash the gum for all the juice it was for, milking out the liquid from every fiber that made up the gum.

“Mother what’s wrong?” Violet asked, noticing the increase in pace and her eyes going foggy again. "Why haven't you stopped?" No words came from Scarlett, she was being pulled back in. "MOTHER NO!!!!" Violet cried once more.

Violet’s voice brought her out of the mini stupor she was falling into. “I… I can’t stop,” said Scarlett, the tone of fear embedding itself into her words. This gum had taken control of her, her mouth unable to stop reacting to the spell that it was casting. She was a slave to a candy, which may have been the most pathetic thing anyone had seen, but, she started not to care. This taste was too intoxicating, it's flavor still like nothing she had ever had in her life, and despite the strange effects it had, she was liking it.

“What do you mean you can’t stop? Spit it out mother,” cried Violet. She still couldn't understand how her mother could still be chewing the candy. Why was she not stronger than this? How could this be happening to her family? All these years her mother had pushed her so hard to be strong, casting an aura that radiated power and pride. It's why she had modeled herself after Scarlett, why she had tried so hard to please the one who had always been there for her. Violet's mind raced through flashbacks of her mother's strength: her father ridiculing her for pushing Violet so hard, a mother of a rival trying to stir up her nerves before a competition only for Scarlett to attack and brag about her daughter, and many times fighting the press and their accusations. All of those situations seemed so much tougher, the challenges must higher and fiercer than a simple piece of gum. How was this happening? "Mother you have to spit it out!"

“I can’t Violet," she screamed in annoyance and fear. "When I tried to spit it out, the flavor got stronger and my mouth pulled it back in. Mr. Wonka what do I do?”

“Try again,” he said. This was both fascinating and frightening to the man. Not once in the past had this ever happened, but then again... no one had ever been as old as Scarlett. Wonka's observations were scribbled all over the once blank card, his comments intermingled with the facts that he had carefully observed. Perhaps the thing he was most intrigued by was gum's flavor increasing as it came close to being spit out. Did the gum have some mind of it's own? Was the formulation perhaps designed to stimulate the body to maintain chewing his work until its effects had finally been reached? Was there something about a blueberry person that was superior to the masterpiece that was the human body? All of these questions ran through his head as he continued to study Scarlett.

Scarlett listened to the man and tried once more to eject the candy, the flavor intensifying once more, the result the same of Scarlett pulling the gum back in. “Someone help me please!” she cried out, her eyes perhaps the biggest they had been up to this point as fear further penetrated her defense.

"Mr. Wonka what can we do?" asked Violet as she turned back to her guide. Her eyes begged for him to give her a solution, something that would save her mother, this horrible woman, from a fate he thought was sealed. Those brilliant eyes, they captivated him, but he couldn't think of anything he could do to save his guest's chaperone from the chewing. Maybe he could forcibly remove the gum, but that might lead to drastic injury for him and her.

Gurgle/i} came a sound that had everyone turn back towards Scarlett. The former blonde wondered what the sound was, and where it had come from. She had a good feeling it was from her. A sudden fullness reached her stomach, the feeling of body being satiated moments ago was now one that was too full. She had felt this a few times in the past, when she had eaten too much fried chicken and mashed potatoes, a combination she was quite fond of, that had induced a heavy state of sleep, what many called a food coma. Yet this fullness was different somehow, she wasn't tired, nor did she feel sick she just felt... full. That is until the pressure picked up and another sound escaped the lower part of her stomach, the heavy gurgling/i} again terrifying her.

"I believe there is nothing I can do Ms. Beauregarde," said Mr. Wonka as he stared at Scarlett. His words had reached the poor mother's ears and she looked at him with wide eyes.

"Why not Mr. Wonka?" Violet asked, her words an exact match to what was going on in Scarlett's head.

"Because I think we're too late. The final phase is starting now."

Violet turned back to Scarlett with fear as the pressure went full force into her stomach. Scarlett's mind racing as she asked in her head What's the final phase?/i}
122111111.title: That's it Violet keep going!

choices: The Mind of Violet:  Calm Down and Think
The Mind of Scarlett:  What's happening and what do they think?
1221111111.content:
Scarlett’s stomach was full, and the resulting bloated feeling flooded her senses, most of which were unpleasant. “Oooh” she moaned as she adjusted her stance to ease the uncomfortable pressure within. In the past when she had intestinal pains, she had found changing her stance could make the difference, often allowing the built up gas to move and escape in a silent, often odorless fart. This was no intestinal gas though, the cause of Scarlett’s uneasiness was something she couldn’t comprehend. The biological alterations that were taking place, were something even many scientists would find hard to comprehend and believe.

* Gurgle * came the noise once more, and Scarlett moaned again as the pressure within further built up. It wouldn’t be long before her redesigned cells began their new process… the process of making Scarlett a juice reservoir. “Oooh, I’m so uncomfortable,” she complained as she ceased her attempts to alleviate the fullness.

“I have a feeling you will be getting more uncomfortable in a few seconds,” replied Wonka, the notecard he was writing on taking the focus of his attention.

“What’s going to happen?” asked Violet. The poor girl was becoming a wreck, her confidence unraveling as her mother’s punishment progressed.

“Oooh, so uncomfortable,” Scarlett said as the fullness continued to intensify. Her body was finishing the final preparations, the last changes involving her secretory cells that were responsible for releasing acid to help digest her food, now conforming into releasing something far less caustic and more pleasant. * Gurgle, gurgle, gurgle, gurgle * her stomach sounded like a churning vat of boiling water, the constant turnover of whatever was inside her working furiously to keep up with the demands her body was requiring. “Mr. Wonka, please make it stop,” she pleaded as she continued to chew the gum.

“I’m afraid I can’t Mrs. Beauregarde,” his eyes left the card and met hers. The poor woman’s composure, ferocity, and vigor had disappeared. Now they held nothing more than horror and uncertainty at what was to become of her. Wonka had already explained her fate, but she seemed to have forgotten his explanation, the stress must have been too much for the poor woman’s mind to handle.

“What do you mean you can’t?” Scarlett asked. Her desperation to return to normal was obvious, but he could do nothing at the moment to reverse the process. She would have to wait just like all the other testers. * Gurgle * another sound escaped her stomach, the fullness transforming into a different kind of pressure, one that was building in intensity

“I’m sorry Mrs. Beauregarde, but I can’t do anything until it’s over,” he weakly replied, his embarrassment showing from the awkward situation the tour was becoming.

“By then it will be too late,” cried Violet. The brat was also panicking, her emotions, like her looks, an exact mirror of her mothers. Wonka just stared down at her, uncertain as to how to respond to her. He had never had much involvement with children due to his father’s strict rules about playmates. His father… that was a peculiar topic, one he tried not to think about too often. With a shake of his head the images faded and his attention returned to the matter at hand.

“No it won’t” he said as if the answer was something that was common knowledge.

“Yes it will, if we wait until it’s over won’t she be a blueberry?”

“Why yes, yes she will be a blueberry,” he said with a smile. “Good work Ms. Beauregarde.”

Violet stared at him in horror and shock. Was Wonka really this stupid? Was this some type of cruel joke to mess with her emotions. . She didn’t know, but she needed a straight answer and she needed it now. “Mr. Wonka, make some sense, how can you help her if she becomes a blueberry?”

“That you will just have to wait and see,” he said with a smile before returning to his observations.
1221111111.title: Panic and Preparation

choices: "You're Blowing Up!"
12211111111.content:
Violet was fed up with the riddle speak, her annoyance at an all time high from talking with the eccentric candy maker. A passing glance at some of her fellow tourists allowed her to observe their reactions. There was little compassion, or sympathy in any of them, the tour had indeed become a hostile competition that she and her mother had foreseen. Violet turned her attention first to the adults of the party, all of them grown men with the exception of her mother. Most of the men held a look that seemed to be a blend of concern and… attractiveness at her now blue mother, the exception being Charlie’s grandpa who only showed worry to the poor woman. Violet never really understood grown ups, not even her own mother outside of her intense love for competition, so she tried not to dwell on them as she focused on her fellow competitors.

The other children, or perhaps more fitting her rivals, were far more interesting to her. Their mere presence meant nothing more than competition, providing an adrenaline rush that she had thrived on all her life. That rush had been building up the moment she got the ticket, and was on its way to peaking, that is until her mother had tried the gum and turned blue. She shook the thought out of her mind and returned to her analysis of the competition. These other kids were mere obstacles that she would overcome to obtain victory. Each kid had their strengths, qualities that were far more advanced than most people she had met at her age.

Her eyes first fell on Mike TeeVee, the boy obsessed with the device his family was named after. Mike was perhaps one of the smartest kids she had met, which wasn’t that big of a compliment since most of the kids she had the “pleasure” of meeting were stupid, talentless blobs. She was impressed with the tales of his cracking the code, the intelligence required to decipher Wonka’s complex distribution system must have been on the level of a college senior at the least. It was truly a gift, one that if harnessed could allow Mike to prove quite a threat to Violet not only on this tour, but in future endeavors as well. To her luck and advantage, that gift was offset by his laziness and his negative attitude. From what she had gathered from her observations, Mike spent most of his time playing video games, his nights spent in front of the high definition boxes that apparently rotted the mind and spoiled the imagination. Mr. TeeVee had let slip at some point in the tour that Mike’s mom brought most of his meals to him, most likely microwaveable dinners that were saturated in salt and fat. Such a diet was not for a champion, more so for one desiring high blood pressure and an early heart attack. Violet pitied the poor boy at the lack of nutrients his skinny body needed, his muscles nowhere near as toned as her own, thus making her physically superior.

If the laziness wasn’t a big enough hindrance, then Mike’s attitude was surely something Violet could exploit. While Mike didn’t say much on the tour, the little he had was a course attack on Wonka’s feats. Whether he meant it or not, Mike’s words came out with an edge, filling his voice with ire and hate, as he criticized everything the factory had to offer. Sure Violet wasn’t interested in the gadgets or the gizmos Wonka had made, but it didn’t boil her blood or put her in a bad mood like it did him. That pent up could be unleashed with the slightest word, perhaps causing Mike to go ballistic and perhaps make a move that could send him on his way out of the factory. If Violet played the game right she could wipe the fool out with ease.

Mike aside, Violet turned her attention to Veruca Salt, the English brat that wanted everything and then some. While their time on the tour had been limited, Violet had heard enough stories from Veruca about everything she owned. From the three ponies in her stables, to the luxurious furs that made up her wardrobe, Veruca was a very blessed child, the money from her father’s nut sorting business allowing them to afford the best. While Veruca said it was because he was the best daddy in the world, Violet knew that most of Veruca’s possessions came from Veruca’s manipulation of her father.

Despite Mr. Salt having years of experience on his daughter, Veruca seemed to be the person in control of the household. That was what made Veruca so deadly, the ability to deceive people into believing her, being led to worship her and reward her traits. Her acting was a qualified skill, but merely a tool for her most deadly attribute, her devious mind. Within that primped and polished face was a tainted mastermind that could devise plans and orchestrate them to manipulate the human psyche. Using emotion, timing, and precise wording, Veruca had been able to breach the defenses of thousands of people, all in the name of obtaining more.

It was both sickening and admirable to see, but Violet would not be fooled, nor charmed by Veruca’s power. Being a competitor in many events, Violet had faced her share of champions with skills just as deadly as Veruca’s devious nature. Violet had learned from these competitors, shaping her self to keep her skills at their peak while also being wary of the devious nature that was innate in all humans. This survival skill developed Violet into a champion, one who could also play the game of ally and enemy, but more for the trophies and glory instead of ponies and dresses. Still… something about Veruca scared her, as if the evil she sensed within the English girl was something she had never faced before. It would take all of her A game to keep the victory from her, and for now required her to maintain the “friendship” they currently said. The great saying of keep your enemies closer, hadn’t failed her yet.

Cautiously she turned her gaze from Veruca, and found Charlie looking at her. Of all the competitors here he was the only one who didn’t seem that interested in winning. Through the whole tour, Violet had watched him, the boy’s eyes lighting up as Wonka explained the miracles his candies were. There seemed to be a genuine interest in the Buckett boy, his fascination not an act to suck up to Wonka. Why anyone would care how candy was made was beyond her understanding, because to her candy was candy, so long as it tasted good. Charlie saw it a different way, and that quality was perhaps more dangerous than Veruca’s cleverness, or Mike’s intelligence. If Wonka noticed Charlie’s true interest, the inventor might choose him as the winner, leaving she and the others the losers. The thought of losing to such a weak, and unworthy quality made her sick, almost enough to spit out the gum she was chewing. Perhaps he would need to be the next one to go.

Before she could follow through with her thoughts, Violet’s world was shaken as Charlie’s eyes locked with hers. They held not the fiery glee and cockiness that she expected, but instead held compassion, for her and her mother. She had seen the boy’s innate kindness in the candy room, first his simple question about gum where she criticized his inability to understand champion level chewing. The second was when Charlie tried to save Augustus Gloop from drowning in the chocolate river, the only contestant in fact who made any effort to save a fellow competitor. Not once had Violet experienced such a response. Most would gladly rub this misfortune in her face, yet the poor boy was extending his heart to her. She was confused at how to take the gesture, pride and rationality battling to interpret the act of kindness. Pride’s response was anger, the pity in his eyes suggesting she was weak and unable to handle the situation, clearly an insult to her ego. Another response was pity for him, for such pathetic displays of affection was something she would later prey on, devouring the kindness as she plowed her way to the grand prize. Yet the strongest, and most unexpected, was happiness and relief, for the extra support that she had been deprived of for years. All of these emotions were fighting to take precedence, but something about the boy had gotten through her defenses and needed to be purged. She would analyze later, for to not do so would be asking for trouble.

She couldn’t be distracted by the competition though, she needed to focus back on the situation, which currently was helping her mother out of the mess she had gotten herself into. The brief analysis of her opponents had calmed her down and got her head back in the game. A cocky smile filled her face as she returned her attention back to her mother, but it didn’t remain long. What she found startled her, her eyes growing wide in shock at the sight,

“Mother what are you doing now?”
12211111111.title: The Mind of Violet:  Calm Down and Think

choices: Stupid word limit, the observations begin, keep going
12211111112.content:
Scarlett couldn’t believe what had happened over the past few minutes. First she experienced the most sensational tasting gum ever. Then the darn thing had turned her an embarrassing shade of blue, even changing the hue of her gorgeous blond, or formerly blonde hair, to the lighter shade. Now she was feeling like a bloated ball of gas, a feeling she was not enjoying.
How could such a great day take a turn for the worst? When she had awakened this morning, her plans were to get a free tour into the Wonka empire, schmooze the inventor, and have Violet win the grand prize. Up until the last few minutes things had mostly been going as hoped, the tour of the factory was on schedule, one competitor had already fallen, and she had somewhat flirted with Mr. Wonka. The eccentric candy man had been a bit tougher to crack than planned. Apparently the poor fool had never been hit on, or perhaps never experienced a flirt from a sex woman like herself. His childlike innocence blinded him from her advances, making him immune to her seduction that normally turned most men into babbling idiots. It was frustrating, but not all men were created equally, both a positive and negative thing depending on the situation.

Despite her failure with Mr. Wonka, they were still on track for Violet’s victory, the main goal of the day. Her daughter had made “friends” with the Salt brat, Violet playing the part of a best female friend quite well. Scarlett had taught her that tactic at her first competition, a beauty pageant where Violet had to contend with the reigning champ Sophia. While the first attempt hadn’t gone as planned, meaning Violet had placed second, Scarlett used that event to teach her deceit. Being a quick study, Violet learned the part of a false friend well, first analyzing her opponents and picking out the biggest threats. Once identified, the next step was to introduce yourself to that competitor in a non-threatening way, breaching their suspicions and lowering their defenses. The final, and most crucial step, was to keep those defenses lowered, not only from the threat, but also from all other contestants until just the right moment when you betrayed the person and snatched victory. It was a lovely strategy, and quite effective at securing the oh-so important victories her family had come to enjoy. Violet’s acting had greatly improved over the years, as had her awareness to prevent her competitors from deceiving her, but she still needed to watch Veruca.

The thoughts were interrupted though as another loud gurgle escaped her body. She started down at her stomach, the trim, toned abdomen she had worked so hard to maintain was now starting to soften and relax. The gurgling noise was at a dull roar now, as her stomach began to press out, rubbing against her tracksuit as a tiny bulge started to form. How could this be happening she thought to herself as she watched the bulge continue to grow bigger, pooling into the makings of a potbelly. How am I getting this fat?

No answer came, with the exception of another loud gurgle, as her stomach surged out again, the swelling more obvious to anyone looking. Scarlett took a deep breath, panicking as she tried to press her stomach in, hoping to undo the progressing change. Her attempt was a brief success, her stomach oddly flattening back to its original form, with the exception of a few rogue flaps of skin sticking out, looking similar to wrinkles in a sheet. Scarlett panicked, causing her to hyperventilate, as she futilely tried to smooth out the creases in her suit. Yet every time she pressed one crease two more would form, and were getting bigger. What is happening? It’s like I’m filling up with something” she thought to herself. Scarlett’s frustration built as the attempts to flatten her folds continued to fail. Frustration wasn’t the only thing building up though, unfortunately for Scarlett the pressure was growing too, the uncomfortable fullness increasing with each passing second, and with it pain as well.

So full, so much pain, her thoughts continued to swarm in her mind as the discomfort continued to grow. Slight whimpers escaped her demeanor, and her stoic face contorted into a grimace as she tried to push past the pain. Deep breaths replaced the shallow gasps, the increase in oxygen hopefully relieving her stomach cramps, at least she hoped it would. Somewhere in the back her mind though, Scarlett knew the pain was not from typical muscle cramps or indigestion. In fact most of the pain could have been avoided if she would stop resisting her body’s changes and accept its new role, or better yet her new role.

Please, please stop she silently begged, hoping her body would appease her desires and cease growing by her pushing. The growing continued to steadily increase, the larger creases in her skin an obvious sign that things were getting worse. The naïve blonde was not getting the message, her body trying to make her see the light and go with the flow (in more ways than one) and let her swelling progress. Scarlett’s pride would not be usurped that easily and to her the pain as annoying as it was, must be overcome to keep her image in check, what little image remained anyway.

I will not give in, I will not give in, Scarlett encouraged herself, as she refused to end her struggle. By now the folds were starting to grow around her hands, some starting to droop over her hands, as the substance within continued to build up. Once or twice she nearly lost her grip to some forceful internal pushes, but Scarlett was able to maintain her grip. I have to stay strong for Violet, I can’t let her see me breakdown in fear. Wait a minute….VIOLET. Scarlett had just realized she hadn’t been paying attention to her daughter for a while now. Surely her daughter would forgive her negligence, after all she was turning blue and now becoming bloated from whatever reaction this blasted gum was causing. Another forceful surge from her body, another struggle, her mind begging Scarlett to release her stomach and be free.

I have to take my mind off of this, but how? The image of her daughter came to mind. Of course Violet, I’ll just focus on her and visualize our success, surely that will end the pain.

Scarlett turned her eyes away from her growing mass and towards the tour group, not surprised, but embarrassed, to see all of them staring at her. Not only was she uncomfortable due to her changes, but Scarlett was not too thrilled that the rest of the tour group were men or boys, the exception being Veruca and her dauther, and perhaps Wonka. She laughed at her little joke, once more nearly losing her hold on her stomach. All of the men looked at her in wonder, their judging eyes mixed with some other quality that further disheveled Scarlett’s comfort level and in her current situation more vulnerable.
12211111112.title: The Mind of Scarlett:  What's happening and...

choices: I'm blowing up!
122111111121.content:
It started with Mr. Salt, whose wonder was mixed with smug joy at the sight of Scarlett’s changes. Scarlett had not liked the stuffy businessman from the start, his air of superiority quite annoying, and misplaced. She was sure he felt the same way about her, seeing Scarlett as nothing more than a hot piece of work, whose dignity could be forfeited at the slightest request, made obvious by his earlier “job comment”. Throughout this tour she had hoped to personally take the man down a peg, but at the moment she was in no position to strike. Scarlett hated that overconfidence he carried, and if she weren’t hiding her condition would have beamed the snide Englishman in his face. Silently she sent a few curses toward him and his family, also placing a wish that he personally would fall victim to one of Wonka’s devices. Maybe he’ll fall in a taffy vat, or get burnt to a crisp in one of Wonka’s fudge ovens she thought. The hate was misplaced though, some of it coming from her self-loathing for putting herself in this position.
It would do no good for her to get angry, so she turned her attention to Mr. Teevee. The poor man seemed scared of her changes, reflected in the slight step back he took when her eyes landed on him, as if a mere look from Scarlett would turn him into a blueberry. His life at home must have been hard, most likely one where he was bossed around by his family, in particular his arrogant son. Scarlett pitied him for many things, his low pay teaching career, his lack of backbone, and even his physical weakness. The man was nothing more than food that hungry competitors like Scarlett and Violet thrived on, first abusing by acting as a stooge, and then backstabbing. She would have said it was all luck, but his being here was due to his son’s ingenious skills of code cracking, something she hoped Violet had picked up on.

* GROAN* came her stomach as the bloating continued, demanding Scarlett to use more of her arms to cover her embarrassing growth. Such demands required her to alter her stance, her stomach resisting all the way. Now slightly bent at the waist, Scarlett got a new perspective on her male counterparts. The slight bump in their trousers indicated a little “excitement” was happening down below. Disgusting pigs she wanted to say to the disgusting slime balls that were turned on to her suffering. Not one to keep her mouth shut, Scarlett was about to share her disgust, but was stopped when the pressure grew deeper.

To curb her anger, Scarlett turned her attention to the last adult, Grandpa Joe the chaperone of the poor little Buckett boy. Unlike the other two, Grandpa Joe had pity in his look. Just look at that old geezer, his weakness is obvious in showing a worthy opponent pity. No wonder he and his family are in the state of living they are, that sympathy they are showing… ooh… make them easy targets to walk on. A smile started filling her face, her superiority still reigning over all her emotions, but another painful surge, coincidently timed with another loud gurgle, stopped the smile in its tracks. Her body was punishing her for her arrogance, in many ways, attempting to have her reassess her thoughts and morals In truth she appreciated the old man’s concern, seldom did Scarlett get any empathy that every being deserved. Her parents, her teachers, and her husband had always put pressure on her, never showing any emotions other than pride, or more frequently disappointment to their competitor. The result of such unruly emotions, lead to her adaption to the world by becoming a power hungry tyrant, bent on ruling over all competition. Yet here was a complete stranger, a man who was selfless enough to show her some concern, despite the horrible way she and her daughter had treated his family. Such courtesy warmed her heart, but that feeling soon faded as her competitive edge, mixed with her increasing worry took the reigns of her mind once more.
* GLOOMP * came another sound from her stomach, the pressure starting to tax Scarlett’s will. I can’t give in, she thought to herself, I must not lose to this… this reaction. Another fold appeared under her lower arm, the flab getting thicker as she gently moved her arm down to smooth out the jelly roll. I need something to take my mind off of it, something that can give me strength. I need to find Violet. She mentally cursed herself for losing her focus again, this gum was really making a fool out of her. With renewed vigor, the hunched over woman searched the crowd again, only to find the infamous hacker staring at her.

The Teevee brat stood their not amused, almost bored, by the sight of her changing. So he is stronger than his father she thought a small victory and compliment to her situational reading. Yet a fury still burned within her. How can he not be more affected by this, surely any person would be scared to see a person turned blue. Is this kid a robot? If the answer to that question were true, it would explain a lot of Mike’s gifts, but of course Scarlett knew better. Still his lack of emotion was unnerving, and she didn’t like it one bit.

Veruca, the brat of Mr. Salt, had a cocky smile that showed off power, much like her father. Overconfidence filled her face, the dreaded salt empire getting entertainment from the mockery of her family. It boiled Scarlett’s body, making her feel a little warmer as she stared back. Verucas was a menace to her daughter’s plans, but Scarlett could do nothing at the moment to help, not with her hunched over like this. Her anger was making her too hot, she needed to calm down or the already unpleasant feeling would get worse.

She turned her attention to the Buckett boy. The poor boy wasn’t paying Scarlett any attention, most likely out of fear, like Mr. TeeVee. She almost laughed, until she took a closer look at his eyes. Like his grandfather they held compassion, but not towards her, but… Violet. She followed his sideways look and found that it was her daughter that was the focus of his concern, the little boy somehow taking pity on the girl. Don’t think my daughter is weak Buckett she internally said with a hiss in her thoughts. If you take her for granted she will pounce on you like a cat on a mouse, and you’ll suffer, or boy will you suffer. However, Scarlett’s conscience broke through and somehow hinted that his compassion lacked any competitive or strategic component, it was only out of kindness.

Ignoring the enigma of morals that were the Buckett’s, Scarlett finally found her daughter. Her pride and joy swelled as she watched Violet, her little champion facing Wonka with confidence and skill. Scarlett could barely grasp Violet’s words, but from the looks of things she was trying to get answers from Wonka. The jerk of an inventor had that same coy smile on his face, one that hid a brilliant mind and a truly devious nature. Scarlett believed that Wonka was not as naïve as he had played, but that everything he did, especially on this tour, was some grand scheme. It was his fault she was blue and bloated, and the annoyance she once felt for the inventor had matured into a strong distaste.

She allowed her curiosity out of it’s confines, as she watched her daughter’s face grow angry as the conversation progressed. The inventor was most likely speaking riddles instead of giving her answers, annoying anyone forced to listen. Her daughter seemed to have reached her limit with him and had decided to take action instead of wait. That’s right honey; you give that jackass a piece of your mind. Show him… show him, he can’t push the Beauregardes around and not face the consequences. Pride swelled within her, much like her stomach was doing now, and Scarlett approved of her daughter’s vigor to get to the bottom of the situation. That is until Violet’s face conformed from annoyance to worry.

No, no Violet, stay strong, don’t show weakness. Her mind screamed, her desire to share her thoughts burning just like her passion to succeed. Her daughter was told to win this competition above anything else, and nothing was to get in her way. Violet was ignoring her teachings, her concern for Scarlett turning her into a teary eyed mess, which Scarlett knew would provide Veruca the opening she needed to dethrone her daughter. Not once did she even think of her fault for putting Violet in this position.

“Vi… Vi… Violet…” Scarlett said, but her voice failed, escaping with a gasp as her bloating stomach deprived her the ability to speak. She couldn’t give her daughter encouragement to stay strong, that she would be just fine as soon as the bloating stopped. Scarlett might be blue, but that didn’t mean she was out. * GLOOMP * came another surge as Scarlett bit back a groan, her stomach was winning and wanted to be free, her stubbornness barely keeping her arms locked around her body.

One more surge like that and I’m done for, she thought. Her eyes returned to Violet who was nearly breaking down, almost begging Wonka to help Scarlett out. I can’t let her lose she must win… for us. Scarlett braced her self to scream Violet’s name, the simple task much more complicated due to her new anatomy. Slowly she took a deep breath in until her lungs were at full capacity, her diaphragm tensing so she could speak…

GLOOOOOOMP came the sound, as the largest pressure yet filled her stomach, the pain forcing Scarlett to let go. Another loud Gloomp escaped as the folds converged into one mass. Her eyes, along with the rest of the tour group, grew wide at the sight. The slim frame Scarlett once had was no more. Instead Scarlett now possessed a gut, her stomach looking as if she was full term with a child. Her light blue track suit hugged her body, still having enough give to stick her hand down, but not nearly as loose as it once had. Scarlett couldn’t say anything, the shock of seeing her stomach blossom out into such a shape taking hold.

Only a single, linear thought crossed her mind…
122111111121.title: Stupid word limit, the observations begin, keep...

choices: Speaking of Violet...
1221111111211.content:
I’m blowing up, Scarlett thought in horror, at the sight of her swollen stomach. Her full term belly gurgled and gloomped as it continued to protrude out. Scarlett was at loss for words at her growing form, the skin moaning as it stretched out growing longer and wider, now approaching almost a foot in width. This can’t be happening, she thought to herself, the numerous changes that had already taken place apparently not enough to convince her that it was indeed happening. As if to check, she placed a hand on her blossoming stomach, the fabric of her tracksuit a welcome feeling that provided her a little comfort.

Beneath the fabric, and her skin, something churned vigorously. Scarlett’s eyes mimicked her uncertainty, squinting slightly as she tried to figure out what was happening within. Another growl escaped, similar to the sound of hunger pains, as she felt it brew within her gut. She traced around her stomach, her hand inspecting all aspects of her new belly as she tried to cope with the swelling, becoming almost entranced by her transforming body.

I haven’t been this big since I was pregnant with Violet, Scarlett thought. Never thought I would be this big again, but she had no clue how big she would soon get. Her mind replayed the “magical” time when she was carrying her daughter, the whole event unexpected. At the time Scarlett was in the midst of a modeling career, her claim to fame being an advertisement for ironically gum. The picture had involved her twirling her famous baton, the one that won her many championships in her school competitions, blowing a bubble as she led a group of eager “customers” to the nearest candy shop. Her lovely legs and gorgeous body must have caught the photographer’s eye, for he suggested a private photo shoot to help bring her modeling potential out.

After weeks of new pictures, she got a call from a modeling agency and soon her first assignment for Wilfred’s Family Restaurant. She was posing as a downhome country girl, dressed in a plaid blouse tied at her midriff exposing her belly button. A plaid skirt complimented her outfit, its top gently hugging her hips as she posed with the various entrees. It was a lot of fun, and sure to be the start of a successful career.
Fate plays funny games though, and for Scarlett it would introduce her to the man who would be her future husband, Ian. His real name was Cerul Ian Bullet, named after his mother’s obsession with the deeper shade of blue, and he had been born in Texas to a C.P.A father, and a house wife mother. The exotic nature of his name was hard to pronounce for most, so his middle name Ian, became his preferred name. Ian had worked very hard for his life, making his career the first priority and all aspects of love in second nature. He was a stockholder and accountant for Wilfred’s chain and quite a looker that Scarlett fell for. That very day he asked her out and that night… things got a little steamy. Days passed, which turned to weeks, and then months as she and Ian fell in love, evolving from a simple sexual encounter to what she was sure was true love.

It was lovely, and truly romantic, something she had seen in the movies growing up, and everything she dreamed of. A loving man, rising fame, and success filled her life and with any luck would only get better. For a while it did. One night after Scarlett had won yet another baton trophy, Ian proposed with a ring that made many of her friends jealous. She accepted and six months later they were married, and on their way to Cancun, Mexico. The honeymoon was great, especially that first night where love became hot steamy passion and fun. What a vacation it was! Upon returning home, where they had expected their lives to return to normal, another surprise came… she was pregnant.

While happy now, Scarlett was horrified by her doctor’s announcement, especially with her modeling career starting to take off and her competitive gymnastics still going strong. What worried her more though was how her husband would take it. His hectic business schedule wasn’t the most welcoming for starting a family and she wasn’t quite sure how they would handle such a change in their lives. To her surprise, he was thrilled at the notion, his idea of a big family starting with this first child, which brought both relief and horror to her life.

At first things stayed the same, she still modeled and got to compete on a regular basis. Sure her performance was a little affected, the morning sickness in particular throwing off her game, but Scarlett was a Beauregarde, she didn’t take her husband’s name, and she would persevere through this trying time and adapt to her body’s demands.

No amount of perseverance could hide the natural progression of pregnancy though, and soon Scarlett started to show. Her agent first made the comment, but she shrugged it off until a week later when the outfit they chose for her felt a little tight, the pants in particular too snug for her liking. Soon her competitions started to be affected, the extra weight threw off her balance and twice she nearly stumbled, almost costing her the championship. She couldn’t allow the consequence of a single night of passion destroy everything she had worked hard for. Thus, Scarlett began a regime of dieting and exercise that would offset the weight she gained.

It went unnoticed at first, the strict diet being done with no one but other weight obsessed women bearing witness. Ian’s cooking, which wasn’t half bad, was limited, the excuse of “I’m not that hungry” being the meal ticket to get by large portions. Within weeks Scarlett saw results, her weight returning to prepregnancy status, and the modeling clothes started to fit, a victory indeed. The charade only worked for so long, before her body rebelled, much like it was doing now. A lack of nutrition on a pregnant body was not a winning combination, the strain of such conditions too much to handle with her active lifestyle. One day at a competition she fainted, exhausted from the ordeal she put herself through. A team of paramedics was on standby and got her to the hospital, where all was revealed and she was put on strict watch.

After that day, someone was always with her, and Scarlett’s dietary needs were addressed. Three meals a day became six high fat and carb diets, which combined with bed rest and low stress activity, made her balloon out to the proper weight and shape for four months. Scarlett’s weight kept increasing, her trim body conforming into a huge baby belly, with swollen ankles and boobs to match. Disgust flooded all the pregnancy memories: waddling like a penguin, somebody always needing to be around to make sure she was eating properly, assistance with putting on her maternity clothes, and perhaps the most embarrassing, someone helping her bigger self off the toilet. She was a pathetic, bloated mess, struggling to maintain her sanity while she harbored the parasite within her.

If losing her body wasn’t the toughest challenge, then being unable to compete was. Scarlett’s natural tendency to compete kept her hungry for challenges, and being forced to watch from the stands, or more so the television, was like a knife in the heart. Why had she let this happen? How could she have been so weak to let her guard down? She never found that answer, but she could remember the anger at herself for making such a poor decision.

Her family assured her that she had made the right choice, often patting or rubbing her stomach, stating how proud and excited they were for her to carry on the Beauregarde legacy. While sweet, Scarlett became annoyed, especially with the stomach touching, and often she would try to escape the attention by waddling into another room. Most allowed her the space, but her husband followed her everywhere, kissing her and showering her with attention and gifts of food. Scarlett would often let him know how annoyed she was with being pregnant, phrases like “You’re not the one carrying an extra forty pounds”, or “I regret sleeping with you Ian” the most used phrases to insult the man.

The only thing that did help was Scarlett’s modeling career, which had been reduced to maternity modeling. Spandex pants, elastic lined sweats, shirts fit for extra large women, and dresses that looked more like tents became her wardrobe. Some of her limited options were cute, but many made her feel uglier rather than beautiful, the dresses especially making her feel like a wide load. Yet, she sucked up the attention and money, with the image of a post pregnancy beauty motivating her to stay strong. When all of it was over, she had hoped for cute little girl by her side, to hopefully boost her popularity with the public.

When labor finally hit, she was excited for the ordeal to be over. Forty-eight hours of pain and sweat finally brought her beautiful daughter into the world, the time of pregnancy at an end, and the time of being a champion back. That wouldn’t be the case. The whole ordeal had removed her athletic body and complications from her early negligence forced her to bond with her daughter more than train. By the time they were out of the danger zone, it was too late for Scarlett to get back on the champion track, her out of shape body removed all hope of landing her modeling career back. All the glory that was Scarlett’s life had faded away, all thanks to her getting pregnant with Violet.
1221111111211.title: I'm blowing up!

choices: Oh MY GOSH WHAT IS IT?
12211111112111.content:
Violet thought Scarlett, the image of her daughter bringing her out of the momentary flashback; time resuming once more from its pause. As if her body had been halted, Scarlett looked down in time to see another surge push her stomach out, now exceeding one foot in diameter. She gasped at the sight, her hand reflexively returning to her the center, which was harder to reach with her increasing girth. Scarlett would have shouted in response, but her daughter beat her too it.

“Mother what are you doing now!?” Violet cried, the sudden shout making her jump, her stomach jiggling as if filled with jelly.

The young heiress to the Beauregarde Empire hurried across the floor to her mother, startled by the larger appearance of her mentor. Cautiously she sidestepped Scarlett’s engorged stomach, placing herself to Scarlett’s right as she stared at the site. Scarlett could see Violet’s disbelief in her wide eyes, her offspring watching as Scarlett’s stomach continued to surge out, the swelling now beginning to migrate to her groin area.

“You’re blowing up!” cried Violet, her eyes migrating up to meet Scarlett’s, the worry ever present by her dilated pupils.

“I feel funny,” Scarlett responded, stating what many would think was obvious; certainly anyone inflating like this would. Her stomach churned as a new pressure built up in her lower stomach, which started to expand into her track pants. She gasped as she felt the elastic waistband begin to hug her lower area, a few moans of disgust escaping as she felt her skin stretch.

“I’m not surprised,” commented Grandpa Joe passively. He had seen Wonka’s miracles first hand, yet never before had he ever seen such a… process for lack of a better word. Surely such a thing as inflation would make anybody feel funny, if not horrified, dreadful, and perhaps even sad.

“What’s happening?” Scarlett cried out in dismay.

“Mother, you’re blowing up like a balloon!” Violet cried out. She watched her mothers front continue to grow out, her pants and shirt stretching to contain the growth. Violet was scared. Not once in her imagination did she ever imagine such a thing happening, the notion of someone spontaneously swelling quite preposterous in her mind. Yet here it was, happening to the one person she trusted more than anyone else. It was bad enough seeing her mother turn blue, but now swelling like a balloon, well it was just crazy and… scary. Violet thought she had mastered her control over the dreaded emotion, but this tour had corrected that misunderstanding. Fear plagued her, part for her mother’s fate, which at the moment seemed uncertain. Another part of her fear, stemmed from the loss of confidence that her family prided itself with. Losing one of their most valuable tools for victory, was incredibly unnerving and she could feel her knees begin to shake at the thought of failure.

However, the greatest source of fear came from the fact that all of this was caused by a piece of gum… her favorite candy. There wasn’t much Violet could take comfort in when it came to feeling safe: her computer time, a stuffed pony named Twinkle, and of course gum. Ever since her first piece, the candy had provided her with a sense of relief from the stresses of the competition her life had become. The countless flavors tickling her taste buds kept things interesting. The various textures of balls, strips, and cubes promising a brand new opening that enhanced the experience. Violet could describe a thousand things that made gum chewing wonderful, but she couldn’t tell you why it calmed her nerves the way it did. It might have been the act of chewing itself that brought peace to her chaotic world. That peace had been robbed of her with this encounter. A strip of gum causing all of this… this trouble, removed all sense of comfort she had in gum, instilling a new phobia not ever seen. A part of her was dying, but mixed with all the emotions she was currently feeling, she hadn’t felt the full impact.

A muffled comment brought Violet out of her stupor, bringing her back to the reality of her mother’s inflation, which had progressed to her stomach being almost two feet wide. The swelling was starting to touch the sides of Scarlett’s waist, her thin frame starting to relax and bulge as it followed in line to her front.

“What did you say?” Violet asked, her eyes turning back towards Wonka.

“I said she’s not blowing up like a balloon Ms. Beauregarde,” he said replied with a cheeky smile. How could he be so insensitive to her feelings? Was the man really that clueless to human emotions? Did he not see how terrified she was, or how uncomfortable all this was making her. “She’s blowing up more …”

“Like a blueberry,” both he and Charlie spoke at the same time. Violet looked back at her mother and stared in horror as her sides continued to push out, blending in with her engorging front. What could her mother be thinking?

A blueberry, did he say… blueberry? Scarlett’s mind was a storm of emotions at the moment. His statement shouldn’t have surprised her, one he had already told her this would be her fate for chewing the gum, and two because all the signs were there, blue skin, her matching hair, the fact that she was swelling up… everything matched perfectly with his explanation. The idea of becoming one though was… horrifying, preposterous, and just plain weird. Her body gurgled again, her face contorting in awe as she felt her sides stretch and begin to join her stomach. The fabric of the tracksuit had done well, the elastic built into both her shirt and pants’; keeping her decent despite the test it was facing For how long she didn’t know, but seeing as how her luck was bad at the moment, she didn’t think it would much longer.

She was right, for she felt a cool breeze rush on her stomach. That doesn’t feel right she thought, my stomach is covered and… oh no. Oh no was right. Scarlett realized that her shirt had reached its limits, the fabric stretching as far as its limited stitching allowed. Her stomach didn’t care, it needed to grow, and it would do so without regard to the human concept of decency. Slowly, her shirt started to ride up, an exposed blue middle starting to form as she grew to about two and a half feet in diameter. Scarlett’s eyes grew in realization of the extent of her growth and she gasped, drawing attention to her.

Smiles grew wide on the men upon sight of her exposed flesh, sapphire blue and shining in the factory light. It was if Scarlett was some type of fairy tale creature, a blue nymph that had come to seduce them, yet she was surprised to still be considered attractive in her swelled form. The erections in their pants were bigger now, Scarlett’s disgust growing as their… appendages grew in length.

“Men” she muttered under her breath. She wouldn’t let them enjoy her suffering as she reached to pull her shirt down over her enlarging core. Her hands explored her giant stomach, working their way down like a spider crawling down a wall. It wasn’t that she was curious, she just couldn’t see where the fabric ended and her stomach began. A few excited laughs doubled her efforts to correct her situation, her hands nervously fidgeting around for the edge of her shirt to pull it down. The uncoordinated effort, made Veruca chuckle, it was a perfect ending fit for the arrogant mother, if only Violet had gotten a piece of the gum as well, then both of them would have been in the same situation.

Embarrassment filled Scarlett at her fumbling, such a simple task as pulling down a shirt now as complicated as a double backflip. She whimpered, grunted, and moaned as she continued to reach, the distance increasing with each passing second as her stomach, now starting to merge with her hips, was approaching three feet in diameter. “Mmph, oh, come one, come on,” Scarlett started calling out as she continued the search.

“Where is it? Where is it?” she cried out in frustration. She knew she sounded like a pathetic little girl, but she could no longer contain her frustration, it was just too much to handle inside. Her sensations soon changed, as her sense of touch felt the transition from the comfy feeling of her tracksuit, to the smooth, slippery feel of… HER SKIN. “Oh my gosh, what is that?” she cried in fright as her fingers continued to run over her front.
12211111112111.title: Speaking of Violet...

choices: Rush to her mother's aid.  Hurry Violet
Does nothing...
122111111121111.content:
“Your skin Mrs Beauregarde,” said Charlie.

“My… my skin,” she said. So she had found another change brought on from the blasted gum. While she had always had smooth skin, thanks to countless moisturizes and lotions, not once had it felt this slippery. No longer the soft texture of human skin, Scarlett’s body now felt slippery, and rougher, like the outer skin of… a blueberry. The course texture was unwelcoming, but she couldn’t help continue feeling the texture. Everything was there, the small divots, the waxy outer coating, the slippery texture that was common to the small berry’s skin. It was true, she was becoming a human version of the blueberry, only it seems filled with air.

The realization made, Scarlett decided that everyone did not need to see her new skin. With a slight tug, she inched the shirt down to try and cover her middle. It didn’t work, she could still feel the breeze on her skin, and her fingers again examining the gap between her shirt and pants. “Inferior fabric,” she grunted out, as she gave a second tug, this one much harder, to cover the gap. Better, but there was still a slight hint of her stomach showing, and the great Scarlett Beauregarde would not show off her features like some cheap slut.

“COME ON” she grunted in anger as she tried to stretch her second tug out to the max. It didn’t work, and so she braced her arms for another tug, this one would be the big one. Her stomach was just past three feet, her hips following close behind as her front and sides were now one. The feeling of her continuous frame, motivated her for a harder tug. She would need it, for her frame was still growing at an alarming rate.

Now or never, she thought to herself and with another groan she gave the greatest pull she could muster. A groan filled the air as her shirt was pulled to its limits. Scarlett grunted in frustration, silently pleading her muscles to pull and for the shirt to keep its integrity as she tried to cover her embarrassing midriff. The rest of the audience stared at her, a few amused at the struggling woman, but impressed to see her accomplish the simple goal.

Scarlett could feel she had won; the shirt had stretched and was now covering her flesh again. A smile filled her face, her perseverance had prevailed, and she stared at the audience with renewed confidence. “I told you… I could do it. Didn’t I tell you Mr. Wonka?” She had gained the upper hand, she had proven that the Beauregarde’s were the superior family, and she was on top of the world. “Violet, don’t ever forget that a Beauregarde can do… can do anything… OOOOOHHHHH!”

Her expanding body couldn’t handle the stretching, her weight too shifted to the front too keep her balance. She could feel herself starting to tip over, the floor coming into view as her bulbous stomach shifted.

“Except keep their balance,” said Mike with a smile on his face as he laughed.

“Mike!” cried Mr. TeeVee.

“Mother,” cried Violet, her words snapping Scarlett into action.

In a matter of seconds her training kicked her reflexes into gear, her hand releasing the tense tracksuit and flying to her back. The momentum transferred into her back muscles, which tensed, pulling Scarlett back to handle the newfound weight. Her falling ceased, but she nearly toppled back for her leg muscles were not used to such a dynamic shift in weight. Scarlett sprung up her arms up like a tightrope walker to help regain her balance, waving them in the air as she tried to throw force to the front. The act worked, her body finding it’s ground as she finally stabilized herself, her exposed stomach shaking one more, the “air” inside jiggling it like a Jell-O mold.

A disappointed sigh escaped her, and she reset herself to pull her shirt down. Her hands started the journey down the stomach again, but stopped short when her back screamed in pain. She tried again, and felt the same sensation, once again stopping her effort. Apparently her little balancing act had strained her back, either that or her increased girth had put too much strain on her body in such a short time. Scarlett winced in pain and placed her hands on the small of her back, just above her butt, hoping to give her strained body some support.

Another memory surfaced, back to her pregnancy, where the strain of carrying Violet had forced her to walk, or waddle, with her hands on her back. Embarrassment, fatigue, and annoyance were tagged with those memories, the thought of being so vulnerable, weak, and fat making her sick. She felt that way now, the similar gesture bringing those feelings back in all their “glory.”

Her body ached, groaning as her skin and suit continued to expand with “air”. Her midriff was more exposed, her skin shining more as her blue belly escaped its light blue prison.
