Stick her ground, she was too afraid to go near her mother in her… condition. What if it was contagious? Would Violet turn blue by simply touching her mother? Was there a chance she would inflate like a balloon? She didn’t know the answers to those questions, but she wasn’t sure she was willing to take the risk to find them out. After all, her mother had done this too herself. Violet wasn’t the one to challenge Wonka. Violet wasn’t the one who put the gum in her mouth. Violet wasn’t the one that ignored his warnings and continued to chew.

No, it was her mother’s entire fault and just as Violet had to pay the consequences for her mistakes, so too did she. Yet something nagged at the poor girl, the fear was definitely part of that, but there was something else that was alien to her. She wouldn’t come to realize it for a few years, but that feeling was empathy. Her heart was bleeding for her mother, breaking as the poor woman continued to inflate into the blue balloon she was becoming. For now, fear was the dominant instinct and despite her mother’s pleas, Violet would not come to her aid.

“Violet listen to your mother now,” cried Scarlett, the bloated former blond glaring at her daughter as if firing a volley of invisible arrows at her. Violet answered her demands with a shake of her head, refusing to come to her aid.

Scarlett gasped and stood silent at her daughter’s reply. Many feelings filled the mom, fear, disbelief, and shame. Violet had been a consistency throughout her life, her loyalty and discipline keeping her daughter in line and under her command. Not once had she ever said no to a request, nor had she ever deviated from her mother’s plan. Today proved that there was a first time for everything though, and Violet’s refusal wasn’t the worst thing to happen.

Still the shame of having her closest ally disobey her and betray her trust was devastating to her pride. In front of all these people, Scarlett must have looked like an unfit parent, unable to keep her adolescent daughter in the straight and narrow. Examples of unfit parents filled her mind: her neighbor Molly Walters, Snookie from the Jersey shore, Juniper Phillips one of her old college roommates that had gotten the stale end of a one night stand.

Even Mrs. Gloop came to mind, as the recent memory of the overweight woman’s downfall returned. The woman had been so full of pride on the television when her obese son had found the ticket. Scarlett remembered how dolled up she had been for the interview, her image trying to match the stereotypical housewife that 50’s television had made famous. It had been nothing more than a superficial lie though, for Scarlett had seen the results of her poor mothering in her boy.

The first sign was at the interview itself, Augustus standing in the butcher shop looking like a slob in his striped shirt. A cringe filled her face, both from the memory and the feeling of her butt engorging itself beneath her clenched fists, as she saw the fat boy covered stuffing his face full of chocolate. When they had arrived at the factory, Scarlett got another eyeful of boy, who seemed to have gotten fatter in the short time of two weeks. While his mouth was clean, the young Gloop boy was still shoving his face full of chocolate, talking with his mouth full of the disgusting brown concoction.

The prime example of Mrs. Gloop’s poor mothering skills came at the candy room. In the magnificent land of edible delights, Augustus’ dreams had come true, his mouth lighting up in a magnificent smile like a kid in a… well in a candy world. The boy had nearly bowled her and the Buckett’s over as he dove head first into the assorted treats that decorated the park. While Scarlett had been a little piggish herself, especially for those delectable cherry filled orbs, Augustus had gone on a feeding frenzy. Scarlett recalled seeing the boy a few times decimating the candy as he bit off the heads of giant gummy bears in as little as three bites, shoved handfuls of cream into his gaping maw, and even dove into a buttercream plant. Scarlett couldn’t have painted a better picture to model gluttony than Augustus Gloop.

Not once did Mrs. Gloop try to stop the boy, not a single word of caution or threat escaping her lips. Mr. Salt had made the comment about how she was too busy stuffing her face for her to notice, the women obviously had a healthy appetite from the state her body was in. Scarlett, however knew that it was poor parenting at it’s finest, the kind of parenting the other adults were showing on this tour. The lack of discipline Augustus had resulted in his demise, as the boy grazed on the grass, much like a cow on the farm, leading to the chocolate river, a liquid brown treat that seemed perfect for washing down candy grass.

Scarlett may not have been the first to see the boy’s act, but she enjoyed the display as the pig dipped his hands in the chocolate river. He scooped vigorously at the liquid gold, slurping it down in loud gulps, spreading the goop all over his mouth. It was disgusting, but Scarlett’s true enjoyment came from seeing Mrs. Gloops’ face as the situation progressed. Happiness and pride filled her large face at first, her excuse of Augustus having a good appetite making her laugh at the situation. Wonka, and she for that matter, didn’t agree as he tried to encourage the boy to stop. Augustus was too far down the rabbit hole to listen though; the boy leaned further in until… SPLASH. Like a cannonball hitting water, the large boy fell into the river, a small geyser spraying up. Scarlett remembered the satisfaction she felt as Mrs. Gloop’s world collapsed, her face molding into pure terror as Augustus went for a swim.

If only you had disciplined him more, this wouldn’t have happened. That was the thought in her mind when everything had occurred, but Scarlett had kept the thought to herself. Still the cocky smile filled her lips as the poor woman raced to the riverbank, nearly falling in due to the poor support the heels provided. From then on the woman was hysterical, her cries and pleas for help resonating the realization that she had failed her son. Violet had looked to Scarlett for reassurance, Scarlett patting her head letting her know she had done well.

As the situation progressed, Mrs. Gloop pleaded Mr. Wonka to do something to save her son. Apparently the woman was no competitor, besides pie eating, her pathetic demeanor oozing out with each cry. Mrs. Gloop’s scream still rang in her ears, and Scarlett’s icy cold heart momentarily melted at the thought of the boy dying. It was true she didn’t enjoy the boy, he had been just another competitor, but that didn’t mean she wanted any harm to come to the boy, at least no real harm. Relief flooded her heart, as well as Mrs. Gloop, when Augustus appeared in the long pipe trapped in the rising chocolate torrent. The pipe muffled his screams, but all felt the boy’s pain as he became wedged in. Mrs. Gloop brought out her complaints and concerns, but Wonka still did nothing, nothing but explain how the mechanism was working and the statistical chances of the pipe exploding.

Scarlett was happy to share her thoughts, taking a stab at insulting the Gloop’s poor parenting and Augustus’s weight. “It’s a wonder that pipe is big enough to fit him,” she said out of mock concern. She didn’t reply, her eyes staring at Scarlett with a mix of contempt, sorrow, and… fear. Fear for what? The answer eluded Scarlett, nothing sticking out to justify her daughter fearing for her. “Violet there…” she stopped herself from speaking any further. With all the attention on her inflating form, no one had noticed Violet’s fear. At the moment it looked as if she was just another spectator, heeding Wonka’s warning about the gum. If Scarlett called out her fear, she would leave her daughter vulnerable to attack. Too much depended on her victory, she couldn’t do that to her family’s honor, despite what she had already done in challenging Wonka. She would have to keep playing angry.

1221111111211112111.content:
“What’s got you so hot under the collar?” asked Mike. “I was just having a little fun.”

“Fun at the expense of my mother you jerk,” replied Violet. “You were poking and prodding her like a piece of fruit at a market.”

“Have you seen her pipsqueak? She looks just like a blueberry, of course I was going to poke her like a fruit.”

“Despite what she looks like, she is still my mother, and I won’t let you degrade the Beauregarde honor so lightly.”

“You don’t need my help to lose that honor. Your mother is doing a fine job of that on her own.” He glanced over at Mrs. Beauregarde with a sneer, as he looked her up and down. “Just look at her, nothing more than a fat, gum chewing bimbo, who had one too many twinkies.”

“Why you little…”

“Come at me then, COME AT ME!” Mike’s scream echoed around the entire factory, the ferocity of his inner anger coming to full boil at the challenge Violet issued. Her arrogance and superiority complex had breached his nerves long ago, his father being the only thing to dam up the river of ire that was within him. Mike had had enough though, and was ready to bring Violet down a peg or two. Even if it meant unleashing the ugly side of himself that he didn’t show too often.

The constant years of television watching had submitted Mike’s fragile psyche to an abundant variety of programs. His parents, while very educated, never blocked Mike from watching shows that were a bit too mature for his age. Thus, from as early as the age of five, Mike had been entertained by classic westerns, crime shows revolving around serial killers, and adult cartoons like Family Guy. The common theme amongst these shows was the intense violence and uncensored details that were meant for people way beyond his years. Hours upon hours of mindless watching had programed his brain that violence was the acceptable behavior, where emotional outbursts, racial comments, and savage beatings were the tools to get what you wanted.

Mike’s parents did their best to “limit” his experiences, but the combination of a strenuous work life, an addiction to cigarettes, and cowardice on his father’s part made the task a challenge. Soon Mike was deeply implanted in the artificial worlds television created, and with the addition of video games to the mix, the situation escalated from bad to worse. The violence and aggression present in the media took seed in his mind and fruited into a darkness that would consume his being. That darkness, and the various negative emotions with it, erupted from him time after time, often in the form of obnoxiously loud temper tantrums. It was very taxing to be around Mike, but he really didn’t care, he had his world and no one would shatter it.

Despite virtual reality being the primary means of his development, Mike did pick up some useful skills, that most his age seldom explored. Crime dramas and science fiction shows had developed his deductive reasoning and intelligence, somehow tutoring him in the art of thinking through situations, gathering evidence, and applying it to life’s challenges. The occasional documentary he watched strengthened his mathematical skills, helping him understand the laws of probability and statistics, which he applied to most things in life.

It was this ability that gave him the winning approach to deciphering Wonka’s code for the tour. Such a feat was unfathomable, as even the elite who made statistics and math their job was unable to come close to cracking the complex system. Mike knew those supposed experts were blind to the answer because they based their ideals solely on formulas, proofs, and expired models that failed to penetrate the core of the modern business world. What was required was the ability to combine the various systems, cross-reference their information, and then apply the appropriate model to find the location of the ticket. It was simple child’s play, literally in this sense, to solve, but adults had the unfortunate advantage of sticking to the comfort of what they had learned. Mike was not limited by such means, at least in his mind, and he would not be limited by Violet either.

Violet took a step toward him, her gait steady, focused, and light just as she had been taught. Mike had seen enough martial arts movies to recognize the styles, and some of their counter moves, but those scenarios were known to be highly choreographed and scripted. True mastery of such skills required years of practice, hours of constantly working the muscles until they retained the precise combination of the movements, timing, and proper tension. He stood no chance, but he wouldn’t go down easily. Mike took a step forward, raising his fist up like some school bully in a classic after school special. Malice filled his eyes, annoyance at everyone that had ruined his day coming out in this next punch. Violet would know not to mess with him any longer, at least not without consequences.

“I’m going to ki…” Mike began.
1221111111211112111.title: keep going

choices: Drama what Drama, there is no drama only information
Veruca takes charge of the situation
12211111112111121111.content:
“Michael TeeVee, that is enough,” screamed Mr. TeeVee as he grabbed Mike’s raised fist. The young TeeVee stared up at his father with hate, appalled that the man would intervene in his moment. For so long his father had never restrained Mike, and the sudden growth of backbone was something quite unexpected. Unfortunately for Mr. TeeVee, it was very ill timed and Mike wasn’t about to oblige his chicken of a father.

“Let go of me Dad! I’m going to teach that brat a lesson!”

“No you’re not Michael. This is not the way to act during a tour, or act at all, and I’m not going to let you embarrass us further in front of Mr. Wonka.”

“Like that weirdo is going to do anything about it,” Mike replied. “Now let go, I want a shot at the prodigy!”

“Go ahead, I’ll take your primitive punches and dish them back ten fold,” she replied without hesitation. Everyone could see Scarlett’s influence on Violet. Such a shame to see the innocence of youth bled dry at such a young age, but evidently for Scarlett was something to be proud of. Violet tried to give off the aura of confidence and eliminate the fear that still inhabited her body.

Most wouldn’t notice the slight eye shift back towards the bloated mass her mother had become. She couldn’t bring herself to help her mother before, not because of lack of love, but fear she would become the very same thing. Her mother had taught her to be cautious of everything, to take no unnecessary chances when it came to winning the prize. Obviously her mother had ignored her own advice, but Violet didn’t want to blow her chances of winning and turning into… whatever it was Wonka said she was becoming. Mike’s poking and prodding had been enough of a test to reassure her there was no threat from being too close to her mom. With that relief, and the fury and shame she felt of her mother’s weak state, she was now more than ready to defend her family’s honor.

There still remained some uncertainty though, as to whether something else would happen to her mother that could affect her chances of winning. Violet cast a wayward glance making sure her mother wasn’t going to sprout a third arm, or begin convulsing like a Jell-O mold on an unstable tray. Surely her mother would have lectured her from taking her eyes off the true threat, but Violet had no doubts that the TeeVee brat was all talk. She found it quite cute to see his raised fist primed to punch her, his naivety that such a barbaric style could breach her defenses. Still it deserved acknowledgement for his bravery and she would bestow him the honor of a quick defeat.

At least she would have had Mr. TeeVee not intervened. The poor man must have really been pushed to the limit to take charge of the situation. Violet didn’t think he had it in him to stand up to his outlandish son, but somehow he had mustered up the courage to restrain Mike. For how long she was unsure of, but she was happy to see a grownup other than Grandpa Joe take action to get the tour under control. The others seemed too hesitant to do anything, and Mr. Wonka… Mr. Wonka just seemed in another world. Why was nobody helping get the situation out of control? Was her mother the only one willing to take any action, even if did result in her… swelling.

As if reading her mind Grandpa Joe asked, “Mr. Wonka aren’t you going to do something?”

“Whatever for?” Mr. Wonka asked.

Violet, as well as the rest of the group looked at him with an incredulous look. What for? Was Mr. Wonka that out of it? Could he not see the chaos unfolding before his very eyes? A woman, who not ten minutes ago was a beautiful sight and the embodiment of confidence and skill, was now becoming a giant mass of blue. Two of the contestants were at each other’s throats and ready to strike without mercy, and were only stopped by perhaps the weakest member of the adults. What more could be done to call for his attention? Her mother was right; the inventor had lost his mind.

“I believe the situation has gotten a bit out of hand sir. The tour is starting to get a little heated, and may require the authority of the leader, which… would be you sir,” responded Grandpa Joe.

“Oh, such matters are so trivial in my world. Why devote attention to the stubbornness of adolescent children when I have much bigger things to study?”

“Because otherwise two contestants are going to beat themselves into a bloody mess replied Veruca.

“So?”

“So that is grounds for lawsuit Mr. Wonka, on the act of negligence for the safety and proper guardianship of said guests,” replied Mr. Salt.

“Not to mention what you allowed to happen to my mother! You’re definitely in trouble for letting her turn into, into whatever she is turning into.”

Wonka laughed at their antics, entertained by their misguided sense of justice, and reliance on the art of suing. Did they really think he was liable for any of their actions? The answer was obvious to him, but the confused looks directed at him made him think otherwise.

“What is so funny?” asked Mr. Salt.

“I thought you all were joking. I have no liability for your actions, nor do I have the obligation to referee a bunch of children while they have their petty squabbles. So long as such childish arguments do not destroy, contaminate, or hurt my work, then I have no problem letting you get your aggression out.”

“What gives you the right to claim such things?” asked Mr. Salt again. The poor man obviously was used to the power granted by the corrupt principals of the judicial system. Wonka was happy to correct his misunderstandings.

“The contract your children signed of course. If you remember, before you entered the factory I had each of your children sign a contract stating that they, and their guardians were responsible for their actions. Unless given permission by the tour guide, or negligence to warn them of the consequences, all violations of the rules would result in due punishment. Since the children are obviously fighting amongst themselves, and I did warn Mrs. Beauregarde about the consequences of the gum, I have not violated my end of the bargain. Do you care to challenge that claim Mr. Salt?”

The English man said nothing in response. Wonka was indeed a shrewd businessman, and, despite his looks, apparently knew the wide array of details for avoiding liability. Mr. Salt knew he would have to pursue a future contract with him, perhaps providing nuts to his assorted chocolates that he put out. For now though, he would have to keep an eye out to make sure Veruca didn’t do anything stupid that would require monetary compensation. He bowed in acknowledgement and returned his attention to the drama at hand.
12211111112111121111.title: Who stops him?

choices: What is the challenge?
122111111121111211111.content:
Wonka on the other hand was happy as a clam. While the day had not gone as originally planned, the amount of data he had collected was incredible. The first round came from the arrival of the contestants at the factory, each one of them giving off a different aura that he could pick up on. Such preliminary measures were crucial to find the child to take over his factory. While the television had given him a convenient perspective, the editing and airbrushing of the media was something he didn’t trust. In person, the threats of hiding false qualities were practically eliminated, allowing him to truly see who was worthy of his kingdom.

In that hallway, he had gotten that Augustus was a single minded glutton, who’s sole purpose was to eat himself into early health problems and a career of endorsing food products. The younger Beauregarde was a highly competitive girl, well endowed with a plethora of skills that would suit a variety of challenges life had to throw at her. Competition had robbed the girl’s innocence though, leaving instead a near hollow shell that was fueled to win at any cost. He knew her hug at the beginning was nothing but a ploy to suck up to him. Veruca, the spoiled manipulator had much of her father in her, a shrewd desire to obtain expensive material wealth. Like Violet she too had tried to breach Wonka’s integrity with a proper, lady-like introduction. The curtsy was a nice touch and her British accent added a certain pizazz that Wonka found endearing. Yet the brief glimpses he had had of her in the other parts of the factory, confirmed his suspicions that it was an act. Then there was Mike TeeVee, a cheeky little brat, who was disgusted by everything Wonka had to offer. Aggression oozed from the boy like cream filling from a jelly donut when bitten, and the permanent scowl on the boy’s face spoke more than words could. He tried to give the boy the benefit of the doubt, but Mike’s quips, cockiness and lack of respect for anything in his factory had put the boy at the bottom of the totem pole. Not a good place to be, for taking over a factory that was worth more than most places in the world. Finally there was Charlie, the boy who came from nothing. Of all the children on this tour, the young Buckett was the one who had the most to complain about yet had the best attitude of the bunch. Of all of them he showed the true spirit of candy making, and true love for the factory that Wonka hoped to pass on.

Wonka knew his true heir would be the one to follow the rules, to resist temptation and appreciate the imagination behind the wonderful world of candy making. When he started this contest, Wonka never thought it would be this exciting. Sure he had developed the tour as a test, using the individual interviews to design temptations for the children to face and give them a chance to defy their nature. Not once did he actually think the children would fail, especially with a parent present to morally guide them to the right choice. He was wrong.

Life was always filled with unexpected things and the young Gloop boy was first to illustrate that concept. The edible room was the perfect opening to his tour, brilliantly designed to show the group his genius, as well as provide Wonka ideas as to which candies would be “in season” so to speak. While such a small group was nowhere near representative of the world, Wonka thought they could give some idea as to what to produce. In the midst of his collection, Augustus had fallen into the river, causing Wonka to drop his information collecting to rescue the boy. Unfortunately Augustus had moved too deep into the river for him to assist the gluttonous pig. Amid the cries of Mrs. Gloop, Wonka could do nothing but watch and gather the evidence at hand. He had asses the boy would be fine, with a little luck at least, and turned his thoughts how to remove the adulteration from his chocolate. Sterilizing machines that would heat the chocolate, filters placed in the pipes to catch particulates from the boy’s clothes, and many other processes would need to be integrated to return the quality to his chocolate, as well as ways to prevent contamination.

The ideas came to him so quickly he had only gotten a few jotted down before the recovery pipe arrived. To be empathetic, Wonka put his notes away and tried to show concern for the poor boy, but such emotions were lost to him. Instead Wonka took pride in his system, feeling a great sense of joy at the ingenious inventions he had made. As the pipe sucked the boy up, Wonka felt he had designed the perfect device to extract the nectar that was his chocolate and little boys up. He was wrong about one of these things! Augustus became stuck in the pipe and as confirmed by Mrs. Beauregarde, the poor boy was just too big for such a pipe. Not once had the pipe becoming blocked crossed his mind, but with this occurrence his device might need some redesign. After the catchy song and dance number from the Oompa Loompas, he jotted his notes down and led the group on.

Such valuable information in such a short span of time, Wonka considered himself lucky to get such great information. While he knew this group would provide him more data, not once did he think he would receive such in depth data. Augustus’ incident had brought him a wealth of data, enough to ponder for the next few months. And now, his second, and most valuable data, stood in front of him… Mrs. Beauregarde. The lovely woman was providing incredible information that would help him conquer the mystery of the gum.

Wonka’s mind began to replay history; his quest to design the ultimate taste experience had started long ago when he had begun creating candy. At first times were tough, with the lack of family support as well as start up costs with beginning a business. Slowly these formalities were dealt with, gradually allowing his mind to be free and solely focused on making candy magic. His concentration and hard work allowed him to achieve some impossible feats, limits being broken as his imagination continued to evolve.

The first fruits of his labor were his chocolate bars that started the chain of his success. More delicacies arose both chocolate and non-chocolate, as Wonka gained access to new resources, both technological and organic, expanding his business into new departments. As more candy came into being, along with more money, Wonka expanded his empire until it grew into the very factory he now owned. Numerous challenges had always faced him during the buildup, each adding more complexity and skill to his art, further developing him into a master of confections. Then came the challenge!
122111111121111211111.title: Drama what Drama, there is no drama only inform...

choices: What's so special about Scarlett?
1221111111211112111111.content:
Yet one challenge always remained out of his grasp, one that if he could solve would immortalize him forever in the world of food. That challenge were the high calories present in sugar. There had been plenty of techniques to circumvent such things: substitution to nonabsorbable sugars, reducing the total amount in the candy, and of course gum. Yes gum, the miracle stick that somehow tried to reduce intake of sugar, by curbing your appetite with chewing. It was an ingenious idea, the creation of a simple stick tricking your body to not eat. Many people soon fell in love with gum chewing, calling it the miracle diet for all to enjoy.

Yet the human race was not ready for such an idea, for like everything they had found a way to ruin it. Negligence to proper manners began to bleed into gum, often in the form of an obnoxious chewer who liked to chew with their mouth open. Wonka cringed every time he saw someone chew with their mouth open, showing their mutilation there mutilation of the beautiful strip into a mass of teeth marks and stickiness. The obnoxious sounds of wet mashing, and slobbering, as well as those slight sounds of enjoyment, blended into noise that penetrated his nerves to his very core.

This only the beginning to what annoyed him about gum. As if noisy chewing was not enough, some humans further found enjoyment by playing with it. Blowing bubbles was the first thing that came to mind, various colors bulging out of their mouths as if an extension of their tongue. Wonka often recalled seeing his customers try to inflate their candy to comical proportions, often seeing who could blow the biggest bubble in childish competitions. How people could take such pride in such a ridiculously stupid feat he would never know. And then there was the sound, oh that sound … that he found so annoying to him. He was talking about gum popping, where large bubble would explode when the pressure grew too intense, or more frequently, the chewer would bite on the bubble. Too many times his concentration was broken from the loud snap of the candy, the repetitive popping echoing in his head. As if that wasn’t enough, humans also had a nasty tendency to take the gum out of their mouths. From young children to grown adults, every age category founds obsession in removing the gum from their mouth. If that wasn’t bad enough, there were some who physically play with the candy like wrapping it around their fingers or stretching it like a rope, before they placed in back in their mouths. Such disgusting habits arose from so pure a concept. His biggest pet peeve with gum though, was the wads he found on the streets or under furniture, the former chewers too lazy and carless to dispose of it in the proper place.

All of these habits had been exemplified by Violet today alone, her eager jaw working the gum noisily as she walked his hallow halls. Wonka could recall a few memories of the young champion blowing bubbles, popping them with her teeth as she resumed her wet, sticky mashing. His stomach nearly turned upside down when she pulled the gum out of her mouth and stuck it behind her ear while she ate his candy. The fact that her mother’s encouraged such behavior, further amazed and disgusted him. Wonka had tried to show his disgust, but neither mother nor daughter seemed to care.

Violet was merely another tac mark on his chalk board of disgust when it came to gum chewing. He had become disgusted years before she ever came into his world. The lack of action from the government forced him to use his own mind to rid his world of both disgusting gum habits, and silly diets. Despite gum curbing the appetite, most could not stop at one piece. One could only trick the body for so long and the idea that gum could take the place of meals just made him laugh. Why could everyone not balance their diet and exercise? You just had to eat the amount to feel full, and keep your diet blended with the groups, with an occasional splurge. That was when the idea hit him.

What if he could get a person to feel full, provide adequate calories, but still be less than what one would get with eating the actual meal? His brain soon began to work on the design and mechanism for was sure to be his masterpiece. The rest of his work didn’t suffer, for he was smart, and had hired help to assist with crafting his creations, leaving him focused to delve into his imagination. His first prototype was a gum whose flavor lasted longer, extending the time from half an hour to two hours. The second product was what became known as gum balloons, an accidental extension of the polymer that allowed it to expand more. Such a simple thing as adding more syrup would cause so much room for expansion was remarkable, but it took off within days of release.

Wonka had made countless other creations before he finally got the prototype of his vision. The first piece of gum that had the flavor of one meal was an incredible achievement, the reward for a year and half’s toil. He still remembered the worker commenting how great the chicken soup tasted, stating he could feel the broth running down his throat. For a while that was all he could get into the piece, unable to cram a second course into the strip. Most of his products exploded, melted, or disintegrated before he could even put it in his mouth. Then one day, by some miracle chance, he got the second flavor in by serendipity. He wouldn’t disclose how the miracle was achieved, but the roast beef passed the test, exponentially increasing in power when combined with tomato soup instead of the other varieties he had been experimenting with. With two courses down he was on a role to achieve his dreams, all that was left was the dessert.

The final course had proven the greatest challenge of the project. First what dessert to pick for the gum that would complement the first two courses. It took Wonka a month to select the flavor, blueberry pie. The color, the unique tang, the fact that it was one of the least used, yet most rewarding flavors was the perfect ending to his wonderful pallet. With the flavor selected, Wonka went to work on integrating it into the gum. Like the roast beef, the dessert’s addition to the recipe was a challenge, the gum responding in bizarre ways that you had to see to believe. Every source of blueberry was rejected, the natural fruit just stayed on top of the gum, the preserves made the gum too soggy, and blueberry juice dissolved the strip. It seemed that he might never find a way to cram that last flavor into the tiny stick.

While browsing the television one day, he saw a chef baking a blueberry pie, adding extra toppings to the end dish. Such skill, such presentation! This was the was the inspiration that led him to his current product. Don’t ask him how he did it. Don’t ask how long it took him to get the process. Just know that Wonka finally managed to integrate the dessert into the gum that resulted in the current prototype Mrs. Bearuegarde was chewing today. Unfortunately it was still a prototype, and Scarlett was demonstrating, still had a few bugs to work out.

Mrs. Beauregarde’s wasn’t the first to inflate into a blueberry, in fact she was the thirtieth to meet such a fate. Wonka had figured there was too much concentration of blueberries in his pie for the body to handle, his process of baking somehow superimposing every fiber of the gum with his extract. No one knew why this happened, only theories bouncing around the factory as to the source of blueberrification. Until he knew what was causing it though, he would continue to alter his process and find a way to avoid this unfortunate side effect. The missing pieces still eluded him, but he would not stop his search until he was either dead, or successful, whichever came first.

Still no matter how many times he saw this process, he was impressed, at the body’s rapid adaptation to the rush of juice the gum provided. Evolution took years upon years to occur, but somehow Wonka’s gum was a catalyst that sped the process along. The body was already a remarkable organic machine, one of its properties being able to store high amounts of energy in the form of fat. It’s ability to expand, as the storage units grew wider was to him the true eighth wonder of the world. That wonder had been documented on numerous cards, boards and panels that were filled to the brim with his diagrams and explanations for how things adapted. Wonka was no anatomist, and lacked the tools and training to further uncover the mystery of inflation, but technological feats such as the Internet aided him on his journey in a fraction of the time. Still the solution escaped him, and would require more time in order to help people like Scarlett Beauregarde, who was his most interesting case to date.
1221111111211112111111.title: What is the challenge?

choices: Just one little touch couldn't hurt, right?
The fear returns, Violet flees to Mr. Wonka
12211111112111121111111.content:
So what made Scarlett so special from the other cases he had seen inflate before him. It was because she was the first adult human to ever try it. All the other “victims” for lack of a better word, had been young girls and Oompa Loompa’s the latter of which he respected too much to thoroughly study. The poor men had suffered enough in their forsaken country, falling victim to the beasts that dwelled in the jungle with a strong appetite for Loompa blood. Such suffering, despite such courage, it was more than he could bear not to rescue them from the nightmare that was Loompaland. That courage, along with loyalty, remained in them to this very day, their willingness to assist Wonka on all of his endeavors despite the danger they had posed.

When the first five had taken the plunge into the unknown and inflated, Wonka felt just as monstrous as the predators in the Loompaland jungles. He had brought them here for a better life, not a substitution to become guinea pigs for his experiments. To correct the situation, he refused to ask them for their help, resorting to other measures to test his concoctions. Still his loyal friends other braved the unknown with him, volunteering to test the revised models without fear of the consequences. And still they became Loompaberries, each being taken to the juicer and allowed to recover. Eventually Wonka banned them from volunteering for this project, unwilling to risk their safety until he was sure the changes were at least on the right track.

As for the other victims, they were human children, all girls, ranging from 9-13 years old. These cases, most of them anyway, had been accidental tests that had arisen from serendipity that he could not recall at the moment. Those girls had been emergency cases, requiring quick action to dig them out of the mess they had made, which meant a rapid trip to the juicing room to be squeezed all in an effort to prevent panic and dismay. He had felt sorry for most of them, but their experience was beneficial in his research to accomplish the synthesis of his miracle gum.

Thirty cases later though, Wonka was in no hurry to undo the changes. He had a better idea about the limits of juice the body could hold and how easily it handled the rapid changes. The rate of inflation started rapidly, but decreased gradually as the body got bigger, crawling to a snail’s pace when the victim neared the iconic round shape of a blueberry. He knew there were limitations to the body though, and once reached would most likely end in ways he dare not speak about. No one had exploded on him yet, but Wonka was sure that the threat loomed out there if he gave it enough time.

At the moment Mrs. Beauregarde was nowhere near that limit, for the arrogant woman was still only half inflated as she stood awestruck by the process. Her rash decision to chew the gum, despite his warnings, did not deserve the reward of immediate juicing. The trap had been set for her daughter, but it was she who would pay the consequences that would hopefully spook Violet into changing her ways before she ended up the same way. From the sight of the display of aggression though, Ms. Beauregarde still had a ways to go.

Such drama he thought to himself as he stared at the spoiled brats. Today was supposed to be about candy, fun, and wonder, and instead it’s turning into crime, punishment, and vengeance. This cannot be good for the candy at all. He looked at the group and noticed both delight and concern mixed amongst them. It was fascinating and surely another opportunity to collect data, though he would need to interview them at the end of the tour to get complete information. Assuming that any of them still remained that is.

Wonka caught a fleeting glance of worry from Charlie that struck a chord in heart. Perhaps I should intervene he thought to himself, it might improve the morale of the group if we just focus on one problem. “I believe you two should take a chill pill and return to your respective parents,” he said awkwardly as he walked up Mike and Violet. Both didn’t take their eyes off each other almost as if they hadn’t heard him.

“You heard the loony inventor, drop the stance and walk away to your overinflated mother,” Mike cried.

“First rule of martial arts is never taking your eyes off the competitor. You first nitwit,” replied Violet. She was ready to pummel him for all the trouble he had caused her mother.

“I’ve seen enough martial arts shows to know not to back down twit. The minute I turn my back, you’ll hit me with another cheap shot. I don’t intend to let that happen again.”

“Then I guess we stay like this forever,” said Violet.

“Come at me you b…” Mike began as he stepped towards his target, fist raised to strike, before a cane came between them.

Both of the kids turned with startled eyes toward Wonka, whose face had a minor annoyance shadowing it, the eyes in particular unleashing dismay. The man himself wasn’t scary, not even now with this…intimidating look did they fear anything about him. The true threat was being thrown off the tour, and denied the prize each felt they deserved. Wonka’s polite voice escaped his creepy face once more, “Perhaps I wasn’t clear, so I will repeat myself. Both of you return to your parents at once, or be forced to leave the building…now.”

The two contestants peeled their eyes away from the creepy man, and returned to glaring at each other. Although different on many levels, Mike and Violet currently shared a seething desire to destroy one another for denying them their way. Neither wanted to leave the tour yet though, at least not before the other succumbed to another wacky punishment this factory had to offer. For now they retreated, but not before exchanging a little rivalry banter.

“Watch you back, Beauregarde,” called Mike, “or you might find yourself in a situation you can’t win your way out of.”

“I’ll be ready TeeVee,” she replied as she relaxed her form and strode off in the other direction.

“Now then, before we continue, why don’t we return to solving the situation at hand,” cried Wonka in delight.

Violet’s eyes grew wide, all this time she had spent on Mike had distracted her from thinking about her mother.

How did that happen? she thought to herself. Stupid TeeVee! Stupid me for letting him get my head. I’ll make him pay, but first back to mother.

“Ooh, oh, ooooooh,” came a cry as Violet turned her attention back to the very woman she was thinking about.

Her vision fell on a bloated woman, whose girth had somehow increased to just over four feet in the last few minutes. Violet could see her mother trying to maintain her balance, her disproportioned front pooling with juice that threatened to tip her on to her stomach. Like the famous balancing acts of the circus, one’s balance could be corrected much more efficiently with the use of their arms. While Scarlett’s engorged stomach and upper thighs would mostly cushion her fall, Violet thought her mother would have utilized the tactic avoid falling into an embarrassing situation. She had no idea how alike they were thanking for Scarlett, who already felt the shame from chewing that blasted gum, was trying to avoid as much embarrassment as possible. So why wasn’t she using the primordial act of survival to keep her standing? To Violet it looked like her mother was clenching her… butt cheeks, as if they were acting as an anchor to keep her aloft.

“Mother what are you doing now???” Violet repeated, this time with more exaggeration, as she moved around to her mother’s right side. Violet’s eyes began to dance over her mother’s body, moving as if she was inspecting, ironically, a piece of fruit. Unlike a produce farmer though, Violet wasn’t searching for flaws in the product, but taking in how much had changed in a short amount of time. It was sickening, it was weird, but in a sense it was… fascinating to her. She couldn’t explain where the sudden interest was coming from, but Violet’s curiosity was starting to get the better of her again. Her hand began to move towards her mother’s stomach, curious as to how it felt. Mike had tried to describe it, but one had to fashion their own opinions by inspecting things for themselves. The fear of touching her mother was gone, now she only wanted to feel what was happening.

Could she control herself, or will she take the bait?
12211111112111121111111.title: What's so special about Scarlett?

choices: Wonka steps up and takes charge, Scarlett has suffered enough
The fun is just beginning, let the wacky ideas begin
122111111121111211111111.content:
A deep gasp brought her out of her momentary stupor, her face slightly flushing from her weakness of being distracted. To cover the momentary lapse of consciousness, she let out a cry of concern, something between a moan and a gasp.

“What’s it look like I’m trying to do Viol… oh, oh… Violet,” Scarlett responded. Her growing butt was doing it’s best to free itself from her iron grip, a byproduct of some passionate nights with Mr. Beauregarde. Scarlett’s willpower was truly being tested, her hands cramping to a level she had never experienced as she refused to release her struggle. Yet the growing mass of her lower anatomy was slowly winning, her flesh oozing its way through her fingers with each passing second, as whatever was inside her kept filling the void in her body. Violet had asked a rather simple question, and she was going to give her the simple answer. She collected her breath and answered, “I’m trying to keep myself standing up!”

There was anger in her voice, her frustrations surging out of her to help her cope with the stress of the situation. It wasn’t meant to be directed toward her daughter, for it wasn’t her fault that she was in this situation. In fact Violet had been the one to bring her out of the state of confusion she was in when the gum first started casting it spell. How could she have been so wrong about the gum? She was so confident she had won against Wonka, that she had called his bluff and seen past his little test of courage to prove the Beauregarde’s were the right people for the prize. The drastic story wasn’t a lie, the eccentric man had been telling the truth and somehow tricked her into chewing the gum with the ridiculous side effect. Not so ridiculous now was it?

“Use your arms mother,” Violet cried out as she extended her arms to her side making a T shape. “They will help stabilize you.”

As Wonka turned his attention back to Scarlett, he saw her make one last attempt to hide her decency. Scarlett’s eyes darted side-to-side, awestruck and paralyzed by how limited she was at the moment. She turned her eyes back to Wonka, pleading he would do something to help her. Was he really not aware of how far this progressed? Did he not care?

It didn’t matter, she needed aid and she needed it now. “Heeeelp, Heeeeeeeelp!” she cried, her voice cracking from the anxiety she was feeling.

Wonka laughed that cheeky, awkward laugh, losing himself to whatever twisted joke that ran through his mind. Violet didn’t look amused, but annoyed, unsure of what he found to be so funny. Wonka turned to the others, still laughing, but they didn’t get the joke either. “Why are none of you laughing?”

“Because we don’t understand what’s so funny?” Violet replied.

“Ms. Beauregarde there’s no air in there, that’s juice.”

“JUICE!!!!?” Violet couldn’t believe his. All this time she thought her mother was filling up with air, never once thinking that the substance engorging her was…juice.

“Yes juice. I told you she was becoming a blueberry, and blueberries aren’t filled with air are they? No, they are filled with juice, and your mother, turning into a blueberry and all, is being filled with juice.”

Violet turned back to her idol, “Mother did you hear that, you’re filling up with juice not air!”

“Juice?” she said in a quiet tone, “I’m filling up with juice? How in the world am I filling up with juice?!!!!!” She stared down at her body, even more shocked at her transformation. She looked back at Mr. Wonka looking for answers, ignoring the pain her bra was giving her at the moment.

“I’m not sure how it happens, but somehow the blueberry pie is the part that does the trick. Our best theory is that the process of integrating the dessert somehow destabilizes the blueberries’ genetic structure. This reactive species somehow gets into the cells of the host and hybridizes itself into the chewer’s cells in very rapid succession. The skin is the first thing to get changed, for skin cells have a rapid turnover rate that makes them a prime target, hence why you turned blue so quickly. However it is not long before your body starts to transform in other ways, most of which involves turning your cells into little juice factory and further morphing it into a form ideal for retaining it’s new product. At least that is what our evidence currently suggests.

“Oh,” was all Violet could say as she looked back at her mother’s shock filled face, her lower lip slightly tucked under her upper lip, and eyes wide. All the details had been a little hard to swallow, unable to fathom or understand just what he was saying.

Scarlett’s upper chest had begun to blend with the rest of her body, working it’s way around to the back where the juice poured in to every crevice it could find until her upper back and torso had become one. The juice was pumped into her shoulders, widening the strong muscles from her baton and gymnastic days, as they relaxed and gelled into a softer form. With her body essentially finished Scarlett groaned as she felt another surge of juice rush into her boobs, stuffing the gigantic mounds further into her vice like bra. “Not again!!!!” she winced as the pain grew to the worst intensity yet, her boobs demanding to be freed from within.

POP, GROAN, POP, POP, POP! filled the air as her bra’s fabric gave out, tearing at the seams until only the clasps held. Whoever fashioned the clips, was a master at his trade, for they were giving Scarlett’s expansion quite a challenge to its growth outward. “These darn clasps,” she gasped, her agony slightly audible to those few within ear shot. “Clasps? Oh my gosh her bra. We need to get it off of her!” cried Violet.

Now she gets it thought Scarlett, but it was too late. Before her daughter took even two steps a loud BLAM was heard. Scarlett’s right bra strap broke free, whipping around her body and settling down on her engorged boob. Not long after the left strap followed, and Scarlett let out a moan of relief as the pain subsided. “Thank the lord it broke,” she said with deep pleasure as her breathing started to return to normal from lack of stress. No longer hindered, her boobs reverted to their normal, albeit bigger, state, now cradled by her tracksuit. Her areolas still peeked out from beneath the back line, but were not as prominent as the tracksuit had more room to give.

She waved her arms and tried to touch her sides, but her rounded form had removed all hope of normal movement, forcing her to stand arms splayed in the air. “I told you I would, but I can’t do anything until you are finished filling up.”

“How much longer will that take?” Scarlett asked in annoyance. She was over this process, which seemed to last a lifetime but in reality had only been ten minutes.

“This isn’t some game Wonka!” Scarlett yelled verbosely, “I’m not thrilled with turning into a blueberry, nor do I appreciate the ridicule for it. Now cut with the snide remarks and help me.” Her anger was getting the best of her again, her body pumping more juice into her arms and further limiting the range she could rotate her arms. Scarlett turned her attention to her right arm and watched as the juice began to fill her toned appendage, turning her petite arm into cylindrical cone of fluid and fat. No longer able to bend her arms, Scarlett whimpered as she tried to move any part of her body that she still had control over. She found she could still make small waving motions with her arms and slightly flap her arms, but not much past that. Scarlett tried to test the rest of her body, relieved that she still retained her ability to turn her head, and… yes she could still move her legs.

At least I still have my legs she thought with relief. As if to mock her, Scarlett felt a pressure begin to fill her upper thighs. Sounds of rushing fluid filled the air, the deep GLOOMPS, WHIRLS, and SWISHES picking up as her legs inflated similarly to her arms. Are you kidding me? she screamed in her mind as she felt them become lost into her waist. In seconds she could feel her thighs stretch, her skin and suit beginning to round out, as her lower body became lost in their frame. Scarlett tried to look down, but the delusional woman was only kidding herself if she thought she could see past her swelled frame. Within the meshwork of her knees, the juice washed over the various ligaments, like rapids over rocks, the force nearly tripping her, as they began to plump. Scarlett was able to correct her balance one last time, before the hinge like movement was taken away from her.

Scarlett would have pleaded for help again, but she knew that until her body was fully ripened, any calls for help would be useless. For now she only wanted to savor what little of her normal body remained. Her knees were gone, her shins enlarging as they too began to fade into her growing frame. Scarlett could feel her entire core expanding to absorb her arms, watching as her biceps melted into her frame. A few stifled grunts escaped her as her elbows became lost into her body, her swollen wrists following next as the swelling’s progress lessened. Down below, her shins and calves were filling to the brim, and merged with her lower area.

The last remaining seconds involved only the few remaining crevices being filled with juice. With one last BLOOMP, Scarlett’s body had finished, she was in a form that no one in the group, perhaps in the world, ever thought they would see a human being in. Violet’s mouth hung agape, slack at the oddity that was her mother, her eyes wide as she combed over the new, for lack of a better word… product. Before her was a round Scarlett Beauregarde, the new human blueberry. Not much of her athletic torso remained within the bloated, juice filled sphere that was her mother. Violet could no longer tell where her mother’s stomach ended, and the rest of her body began, all lost to the giant curve she had become. Even her arms and legs were non-existent, only her hands and feet acting as place markers to where they had once been. Violet could not bring herself to speak; she was too shocked and embarrassed to provide her normal strong remarks that would boast her family’s reputation. At the moment, there was nothing to brag about. There was no honor in the current situation, her mother being the swollen mass overwhelming the principles that had gotten Scarlett here in the first place.

'If I’m taking it this bad, imagine how mother is taking it?' she thought.

Scarlett could only whimper and groan as she investigated her body. Her beautiful figure was gone, swollen into this… this bloated form that moments ago seemed a ridiculous threat, meant only to unnerve her.

“Please, let this be a dream. Let me wake up from this nightmare and have my self, my life back,” Scarlett begged.

This was no dream however, she was actually a… blueberry, and she was not thrilled at all. Turning her neck to the left and the right, thankful that she still had the ability to turn something in this form, Scarlett observed what she had become. Her body was a single perfect curve, devoid of any anatomical landmarks that were common to the human body. No longer did she have her delicate hips nor her trim stomach. The dainty waist that had attracted so many was nearly 8 times as wide as it once was, swallowing her athletic shoulders in the process. Heck, not even her arms and legs remained. Scarlett craned her neck hoping she could at least make out her butt, but the inflation had pushed her back too far for her to see, that like everything else, it was gone.

Other than her head, the only parts of her body that remained differentiated from her bloated form were: her hands, feet, and… her boobs. They had become the size of three watermelons stuffed together, no longer able to be classified by cup size in their expanded glory. Her tracksuit outlined the frame of her bosom, only a quarter exposed at the neckline of the suit, shining in the light. . Never did she imagine them ever growing to this size, nor did she ever think they would be filled with a liquid other than… milk.

She looked back out at the group, all still amazed at what she had become. Embarrassment started to settle back in, anger following, as she began to feel sorry for herself once more. Beauregardes were champions, not victims, deserving only the best in all life had to offer. These were her morals; these were the qualities that made her stand tall among those who were inferior to them. Now though… now she was the inferior one, all her attributes and principles gone down the drain with her body. She had shamed her family today, perhaps irreversibly.

No, she couldn’t let herself fall into depression, she had to stand taller now more than ever. Her family’s honor required Scarlett to push past this awkward moment and stand tall despite what had happened. Violet was watching after all, and Scarlett needed to show her that she could still maintain control, and take charge. Holding back tears she yelled, “Okay Wonka you’ve had your fun, but enough is enough.”

“What do you mean?” he asked in confusion.

“I mean I’m done ripening you boob! I’m not growing anymore and you said once I’m done ripening you could fix me. Now fix me or so help me I’ll…”

“I’m not some experiment Wonka! As your guest, I demand respect, and respect involves returning me to normal now! So call your little workers, and get me fixed… PRONTO!” She emphasized the last words with force, showing that she still had command of the situation. Already she could feel her strength returning, her eyes narrowing just enough to show she had fight in her. A small smile tinged her purple lips, the emerging as she gazed back at the crowd to show she meant business. What she found though wasn’t the usual fear it was… amusement. Her alpha predator status had been swapped with one of prey, they were obviously now the superior competitors in this tour. This rounded form had robbed her of so much already, and it just kept on taking. Scarlett tried to maintain a threat, but her glare remained ineffective as the group just smirked, laughed, and in some cases drooled over her new body.

“Excuse me Mrs. Beauregarde,” Wonka interrupted, “but you are in no position to berate me for not fixing you. Do you have experience with this process? No, at least not as much as I do. When I said I had to wait for you to ripen, I meant it, because things can go horribly wrong if you juice to quickly. My observations that I take are to gather information to help solve these problems, hopefully preventing others from suffering the same fate.” Everyone, including Scarlett, was shocked by Wonka’s outburst. Up until now he had been so calm and awkward, almost a push over. Yet he apparently had some bite to him.

Wonka himself was surprised at the sudden outburst, as he regained his composure and apologized for his rudeness. With a small clap, he turned to the shadows where the small Oompa Loompa was waiting patiently. Like a loyal dog, the Loompa walked up to Wonka, and stood at attention awaiting orders from his boss. “I want you to gather your crew and roll Mrs. Beauregarde down to the juicing room at once please.”

“THE JUICING ROOM?!” asked Violet in surprise. “What is the juicing room?”

“What do you think it is genius?” said Mike with a rude air. “It’s a room where they get juice out of things, like you see in a winery. Guess it is true that blonde’s are airheads.”

“I’ve had just about enough of you TeeVee,” Violet fought back, her own temper getting the best of her.

Scarlett’s outcry defused the situation, startling the two children with her high-pitched scream. “You’re going to juice me?!”

“Yes, it’s the only way to get you back to normal, we have to get the juice out of you or you’ll remain a blueberry.”

“What are you going to do to get the juice out?”

Wonka smiled, “They’re going to squeeze you… like a little pimple. That should force the juice out of your body and get you back to normal… mostly.” Her face twisted in horror, the thought of being pressed like a piece of fruit and forced to expel juice made her nauseous. Even worse, she could already see some of the other tourists' smiles growing wider, thoughts of the process filling their heads.

She couldn’t let that happen, she couldn’t let herself be further humiliated than what she already was. “Can’t you do anything else?”

“Unfortunately no, we’ve been trying to develop other ways, but none have proven quite as successful as the juicing room.” He signaled the Oompa Loompa to begin his work, who clapped his arms over his chest in acknowledgement and let out a whistle. From out of the shadows other Loompas arrived in matching jumpsuits making their way through the crowd over to Scarlett. Violet watched terrified at what they would do, wondering how such small men could move such a large woman.

Her mother was thinking the same thing. She stood terrified as the Loompas paused just outside her girth, studying her delicate form. Scarlett rolled her eyes in annoyance at being analyzed like a wide load. “There has to be another way Mr. Wonka! Surely you can do something else?”

“Well we could leave you as a blueberry would you like that?” Wonka said with glee.

Was she actually going against the very woman who had trained her? “If you want to go back to normal… *gulp* you’re going to have to be juiced,” said Violet. It must have been hard to say such a thing, but she had done it. Violet’s dependence on her mother was starting to show, a huge chunk in her armor that others would use.

“How dare you speak to me like that young lady? You are to support me, not the inventor!” She was appalled at the betrayal, hurt that her daughter was starting to crumble under the pressure. Yet she also saw compassion, a look she rarely had experience with, within his look. Now Wonka, let’s get my mother fixed… IMMEDIATELY.” The competitive glare returned, her fury along with it.

What she saw further upset her, for the tiny men were walking around her mother studying her every angle.

Some of the men had their hands under the chins, others paced about with their arms behind their backs, and others stood stone still with pinpoint focus. Scarlett looked at each of them, wondering what thoughts were running through their minds. Their quiet demeanor unnerved her, for these little miscreants said very few words, yet got so much accomplished. Apparently they ran this factory for Wonka, efficient in every process that was held in the walls of this factory. These qualities made the Loompas perhaps the most threatening opponents she ever met, especially with her unfamiliarity with everything currently at hand. Scarlett tried to hold her own composure, attempting to keep her threatening glare while the Loompas contemplated their best approach. Scarlett noted a few moving their heads, while others gestured with a shake, a signal, that apparently, indicated one of them go for a closer look. A few did, arms outstretched, as they came in for a closer inspection. They were going to touch her!

“Hey, HEY, get away from me! Shoo, shoo!” Scarlett commanded as she feebly waved her hands to keep them away. The Loompas ignored her useless flaps and pressed her hands against her form with gentle prodding. A few of them gently traced their hands over the exposed skin, while others stuck to the fabric of the tracksuit. “Hmmmph…Hey… quit it… stop touching me… get away, I said get away!” Hands flapping wildly, Scarlett tried to get the strange men to leave her alone, but they continued to inspect her body.

“Mr. Wonka, please call off your goons… stop them from, hmmph, touching me,” she sneered at the last remark.

“They’re doing a last minute check to make sure you are fully ripe. We don’t want you to smoosh now do we?”

“Well…” began Veruca

“Don’t you even dare you little brat,” said Scarlett.

“Mrs. Beauregarde, please understand. They are just trying to figure out the best way to transport you to the room. If we do this wrong you could get hurt and we don’t want that do we?”

“They do Ms. Beauregarde, but they’ve never handled anyone like your mother before,” he said with a little pause.

“What do you mean like my mother? A champion? A strong woman?”

“No… I mean they have never handled someone as… big as your mother,” he said with embarrassment, rouge starting to paint his cheeks from his choice of words.

Scarlett turned her attention back to Wonka, eyes wide at what he had just said. “Excuse me… are you calling me fat!”

“No! No! Well… yes you are now, but none of the others have been quite the dimensions your mother currently is.”

“What does that mean?” asked Violet.

“Well most of the other victims of the gum have been Oompa Loompas who are a fraction of your size. When they blew up into blueberries they didn’t grow nearly to the size she has. Your mother has exceeded the record for becoming a blueberry. You should be proud!”

“I take no pride in my mother’s suffering,” she screamed with anger.

“Nor do I take pride in turning into a blueberry!” Scarlett agreed.

“Regardless, they have much more to work with, so they have to plan a little better for how best to move her.”

“How big do you think she is?” asked Mr. TeeVee, his naturally curiosity started to take hold again.

“Too big if you ask me,” said Veruca with a smirk, goading another glare from Violet. The blonde twit was too easy to manipulate into doing her bidding.

“About six feet in diameter at least,” said Mike. The mathematical genius had an eye for accurately estimating things. “She has grown big indeed!”

“I think you are underestimating her growth Mike,” Veruca chimed in again.

Somehow her body had subconsciously moved it to the side as if saving it for a snack. Thanks to this stupid candy she was now a fruit woman, shamed beyond any measure she had ever felt. Her face became flushed as her temper started to flare, so much rage to the inanimate object in her mouth.

Her eyes turned towards Wonka, it was his creation that did this. Somehow she wanted to get back at him, but how? A few simple thoughts filled her mind, but the only one that gave her a slight satisfaction was spitting the wad at him. She worked her cheeks and put the gum in the middle of her mouth, preparing to launch the wad like a projectile. It filled her heart with glee knowing that if she could get a good spit and land the gum on his face, she would have justice.

As she prepared to spit, her mind switched gears on her, formulating a much better plan. Why should I take the chance of spitting on him, when Wonka is all about his candy. I may have lost this competition, but I might still come out a winner. He has no idea I still have the gum. I can find a company and sell them this piece, and the Beauregardes will reign once more. Hah, stupid man, I still get the last laugh despite being a blueberry She couldn’t give her plan away.

Will the plan work?

Her eyes narrowed in anger, it seemed that Scarlett would be getting her own tune as a reward for her mistake.

The Loompas began to step in time to the simple beat, the melody having a light tone to it that mocked her with every beat. Once more the factory was enjoying her suffering, happy to rub her transformation in her face.

”“Oompa Loompa, doobadi doo! they began singing in time to the beat, “. I’ve got another puzzle for you. Oompa Loompa doobadi dee, if you are wise you’ll listen to me. “ The Loompas began to bob with their walk, circling Scarlett faster as their pace matched the beat.

“What are you doing?” asked Scarlett. “Where are you going?”

Their only answer was a continued singing, their rhythm uninterrupted as they continued to do their job. She tried to find the lead Loompa who could give her some clue to what this odd ritual was about. Unfortunately he blended in with the others, hiding in plain sight with his fellow workers. Unable to determine the leader, Scarlett merely turned her head left and right, trying to keep an eye on the workers. Her rotund form made such a task difficult to do, her flexibility limited now by her orb like body. She would have to do something else to keep up with them.

I’m going to have to walk she thought. Can I do that in this form?. She tried to look down, but her enlarged stomach would not speak to her in any way. A slight graze along her backside surprised her, forcing her to make a decision. I have to try, I refuse to let them rob me of any more pride! Scarlett tried to find her legs in her mass of a body, but they were too relaxed and irresponsive. The only thing she could feel working were her feet, still able to provide some leverage if she really focused. Slowly she tested their ability, working out how much force she could apply without tipping herself over. After a few simple toe pushes she felt comfortable enough to move, she put all her efforts into her right foot. With all her will Scarlett managed to turn her body a few inches, her body slowly rotating like a planetary body.

First turn complete, let’s use the momentum to keep going. She used her left foot and mirrored her previous movement, turning her back to her original position. Not her intention, but Scarlett regaining some control was a great to comfort to Scarlett. She repeated the movements in sequence, slowly waddling forward as if she was trying to escape from encircling tormentors. They merely adjusted their steps, still keeping in time with the beat, as they continued to walk around her. Various whimpers and stifled whines came out of her, the effort starting to tire her as she perservered. The Loompas continued to revolve around her, almost as if she was Saturn and they were her rings. Such an analogy made her tear up, the comparison to a planet indicated she acknowledged herself as fat. Not once in her life had she ever felt so weak, helpless, and ashamed.

Her waddling ceased, her body too tired to continuous the laborious process. She took heavy breaths as she recovered, it was like she had run a mile, when she had merely moved half a foot. The Loompas were just fine, singing their tune as without delay.

“Competition can lead to great rewards, but too much can turn you into a monster.” As they sang, the Loompas crowded in and gently placed their hands on Scarlett, preparing to put her in a position much easier to transport.

She moaned and yelled, “Get away from me, Get away from me,” as she flapped her hands again, the useless gesture humorous to the watching public. The Loompas pushed, starting to turn Scarlett on what was once her back. Their first attempt wasn’t’ enough for Scarlett’s increased weight, which corrected the momentary push and brought her back on her feet.

“Cut that out!” she screamed. “Are you trying to tip me over?”

One of the Loompas nodded as they prepared to push again.

“Like a blueberry cow!” laughed Mike.

The Loompas paid no attention as they continued singing, applying more force this time to her front. “Look what arrogance has gotten for you, making you wide like the berrrrry blue, now you’re filled up with juice!” Their efforts were working, the poor woman was starting to lift.

“No, no, put me down!” commanded Scarlett. These little workers were stronger than they looked, and she didn’t like it. Already she could feel her feet lifting off the floor, flopping in the air as they tried to regain purchase on the ground. She was losing the battle she had to do something. “I said… put… me… DOWN!” she screamed, startling the Loompas enough that they momentarily lost their strength. They weren’t done yet, they pushed again determined to fulfill the job Wonka had given them. Again Scarlett felt their combined efforts, her feet again removed from the floor as she started to rise once more. The juice inside her started to pool towards her back, easing her tipping and encouraging her fall. Her sudden shift in gravity and the feeling of falling made her gasp, the gum getting sucked down her throat in the process. Scarlett coughed, nearly choking on the blasted candy’s trip down her esophagus.

Oh great I swallowed it, so much for my plans of selling it she thought. They had nearly won, she was almost at the point of no return, and Scarlett refused to go down without a fight. “I don’t want to be tipped! Put me back on my… my… FEET!” she screamed as she forced her head and body forward.

Somehow it worked, her will able to offset the Loompas pushing to send them scattering back as she returned to her feet. Her effort nearly tipped her over on her front, her useless hands flapping like propellers to barely keep her balance.

“I… gasp… I won’t… be tipped like a… like a cow!” she said with force.

“Mrs. Beauregarde we have to get you to the juicing room. Please let the Loompas do there job so we can get you back to normal.”

“Why do I have to be on my back to get to the juicing room?” she asked fiercely.

“Because rolling you is much easier than dragging you,” said Wonka calmly.

“Rolling me!!!! You are not going to roll me, Wonka!” screamed Scarlett. “I am not some toy ball for your little workers to enjoy. I am Scarlett Beauregarde, a human who demands she be treated with respect and proper care.”

“And we are trying to provide that care my dear, but you are making it difficult to do with your constant struggling!”

“Mr. Wonka, I don’t consider being rolled proper respect. Not once in the history of the Beauregarde legacy has a member of our family ever been… rolled, and I don’t intend to be the first.”

“I’m sure there has never been a Beauregarde turning into a blueberry either, but you’ve set that record haven’t you?” asked Veruca.

Scarlett sent another piercing gaze to Veruca, but she didn’t have time to trounce the little brat. “There must be a way to get me to the room that doesn’t involve rolling me Wonka.”

“It would take too long to get the forklifts down here, we need to get you going now, or juicing you could become extremely difficult!”

“How is that?” she asked, making the assumption that he was going to give a halfhearted lie.

“Your body has finished expanding, but the juice is still flowing in your body. Soon your skin will start to reach its limits and you’ll grow incredibly tense. When that happens, the juicer must be adjusted to gently squeeze you, so that we don’t accidently rupture your skin that can lead to permanent scarring. So why don’t we just roll you on…”

“Find another way Wonka, or I’m not going!” Scarlett screamed. She had had enough of this useless banter. She had principles and she was going to stick to them.

“I’m afraid I don’t have time to do that Mrs. Beauregarde, we must continue on with the tour.” He nodded to the Oompa Loompas and they resumed their singing, once again pushing Scarlett off her feet. She screamed out her frustration feet uselessly kicking out at the workers’ faces

“Oompa Loompa doobadi Dah, given good manners you will go far, you will live in happiness too, like the Oompa Loompa Doobadi…”

GROAN, GLUUUUUURRRRGGGGG, BLOOP came the familiar sounds. The Loompas released Scarlett and backed away, her newest internal symphony confusing them. Moments ago they were sure she had fully ripened, yet now it seemed like something else was happening.

Scarlett looked at the surrounding workers with confusion, unsure of what had made them flee. She assumed the sounds were the same ones she had been hearing, surely there was no reason to be alarmed.

“What’s wrong? Why did they suddenly stop?” asked Charlie.

“Mrs. Beauregarde, it seems you are not done expanding.”
