12211111112111121111111121121221.content:
“I’m not?” this startled her. “How can I possibly get any bigger? I’m already the size of a house!”

“I’m not sure, I’ve never seen this before myself,” Wonka replied.

Scarlett was sure Wonka had lost his mind. The thought of her body expanding any further seemed practically impossible. No, she wasn’t buying it, she would not fall victim to fear.

“You’re lying!” she accused.

“I seriously doubt that, but maybe I am wrong, but I don’t think they would have stopped without just cause. I’m terribly sorry again for your suffering Mrs. Beauregarde.”

“Enough of the threats Mr. Wonka. Fix me now! I am not going to get any…” BLOOMP came a familiar sound that was followed closely by a familiar pressure. She turned her gaze back down and knew that Wonka’s suggestion may not have been as ridiculous as she once thought. “Oh no,” she blandly said out before turning her gaze back to the crowd.

The pressure grew deep in her core and spread out, expanding her body further from all sides. While only her front was visible, Scarlett could feel the process happening on all sides, uniformly spreading out unhindered. “No, please not again!” she pleaded as more gurgles escaped her ballooning form. “Mr. Wonka why is this happening?”

He didn’t reply, he was back to scribbling notes walking with his workers and inspecting her, occasionally shaking their heads. Some of the Loompas had taken to backing the crowd up, giving their coworkers more room to handle the situation. Her diameter was nearing 8 feet, her body’s growth accelerated by some unknown force, as it demanded more room. Scarlett flapped her hands, the only comforting act she could find as they bounced off her bloated sides. She tried to move her feet, but her new growth started to weigh them down, her lower frame beginning to sag onto her toes. For the first time in her life, Scarlett could touch her stomach with her foot.

I’m so big she thoughtbefore screaming out, “Oh, oh, oh, this is too weird. Help me, help me somebody!!!!” Her hands flapped even harder, the fingertips just visible to her as she desperately wiggled them. Was it her imagination or were they getting farther from each other. No, it wasn’t her imagination it was actually happening. Her body was growing outwards, spreading her hands further apart as she reached 9.5 feet. So wide, so full, but still nowhere near complete. “Help, help me please. Mr. Wonka I’m getting too big!”

Scarlett’s cries could not breach his curiosity, his observations too important to be interrupted. As he wrote, she looked over her body, the view getting more obscured by her expanding front. Already the closest of the group was starting to disappear, only half her daughter visible. “Violet, do something. Help me this instant!” she called out.

“What do you want me to do mother?” she asked. She couldn’t see her skills providing much help in the current situation.

Scarlett couldn’t answer, her body only making another GURGLE sound as the juice pushed out further. “I don’t know, just… just… keep me standing up straight and moving.”

“I don’t know if I’m strong enough too…”

“You’re being weak Violet, a Beauregarde can do anything she sets her mind to. Just watch!” Scarlett decided to try and waddle once more, working to provide the necessary leverage to get her body moving again. With a mighty push she tried to force her body to inch forward, but something was wrong, she didn’t move. She made another attempt, putting even more force behind it, but the only movement was her body rippling as the juice dispersed within. Her eyes grew wide, she was stuck in place, the increased growth was too much for her feet to handle. They were planted, the feeling of her smooth, slick skin rubbing against her shoes making her twinge as they anchored her feet down.

“What’s wrong mother!?” asked Violet in alarm.

“I… I can’t move! I’m too heavy for my feet to move. OH GOD somebody help me please!” She was pushing almost 10.5 feet now, her lower frame starting to displace her feet as it began to caress the floor. Her hands were still flapping away, making a Mike and Veruca laugh at the comical gesture. Scarlett looked like an obese bird trying to take flight.

“Flap away, flap away little bird,” said Veruca. “You’ll never get too far with all that weight on you.

Scarlett’s defenses were starting to fall, her increasing size and the increasing ridicule were too many attacks for her pride to take. She held her tears, trying to remain strong as her legs stretched further apart, displaced by her lower area. Scarlett felt her enlarged… groin, for lack of a better word; touch the ground, the sensitive area getting stimulated as it pressed into the floor. The pleasure she felt from such feelings, sent her into a state of ecstasy, excited moans nearly escaping her in the process. Another gasp escaped her body as she felt herself rise further, her feet kicking in the air as they were lifted, unaided, into the air.

“Mother your feet have left the ground!” Violet called.

“No kidding, Captain obvious!” cried Mike.

Violet ignored his quip, trying to get some action to help her mother. “Mr. Wonka we have to do something quickly!” pleaded Violet

Yet Wonka still did not answer, he only remained focused on studying Scarlett. Her frame was still growing at an alarming rate, already reaching 12 feet in diameter and still showing no signs of stopping. How could her skin hold so much juice? It was incredible for the body to do such a feat, and to think it was all from a strip of gum. The air filled with the heavy sounds of coursing juice, the BLOOPS and GURGLES making a juicy symphony that most would not appreciate. Scarlett’s feet still kicked furiously trying to find purchase on a ground that was at least two feet away. “I’m getting too big! I don’t think I can hold much more! Please, please stop, I’m already a blueberry I don’t want to be a blue boulder.”

Her body disobeyed, expanding into a bigger juice reservoir. Scarlett just shut her eyes as she felt another surge, push her body out, this time pooling into her ankles. Slowly her flailing feet stiffened, the ankle joints becoming absorbed into her body until her feet sunk into divots that were forming on her body. Her feet disappeared as they were swallowed further into her body.

“Mrs. Beauregade, your feet,” said Charlie

“What about them?” she asked coarsely.

“They’re gone!”

“GONE!!!!” Scarlet tested the theory, horrified to find her feat unresponsive to her commands. “No, no they can’t be! Mr. Wonka what happened to my feet!”

“Calm down woman, you just grew so fat that your body expanded over them. Wiggle your toes and you’ll probably feel them,” replied Mike. This spectacle was getting old for him, his short attention span starting to waver. He just wanted to move on and win the prize; he could care less what would happen to this woman.

Scarlett just stared at him in anger, but the boy’s proposition made sense. She wiggled her toes, feeling them bounce about in her sneakers.

{He’s right! They are still there! Thank God!/i} she thought. It didn’t matter, to Scarlett’s body; it just kept growing reaching almost 15 feet wide. Her skin started to moan as the juice within demanded more expansion. Scarlett’s view of the floor below was almost gone, her body so wide that she could only see a sea of blue. She needed to adjust her angle, or face staring at her stretched out belly for the rest of the day. With tremendous effort, she tried to push her body forward with her hands, hoping to start a rocking movement that would help get her head forward. The first few flaps got the momentum going, but her hands started to stiffen, much like her feet had done earlier.

As her body grew to 17 feet in diameter, her hands began to sink deep into her body. “No not my hands! Please not my hands!” No amount of begging would get her body to cease as her hands were pulled into their own divots, leaving them invisible to the group. Scarlett wiggled her fingers and felt them drum her skin, the taps resonating through her body from the medium it contained. At least she could still do that.

With her hands gone, the only features of Scarlett that remained were her giant, 10 feet wide breasts and her head. Her breasts were filled to the brim with blue liquid, feeling like they could explode at any moment. Due to some miracle, her shirt was able to stretch with her body, not as constricting as her ruined bra. Yet how long would her luck hold out, she didn’t know. Mr. Salt and Mr. TeeVee, truly appreciated their size, wishing they could do more than just watch them protrude out. Perverts she thought in disgust, wishing there was some way for her chest to disappear.

“Such a shame,” whispered Mr. Salt, “such a magnificent spectacle gone in a short span of time.

Soon they were gone, the only remnants being her fat nipples that blemished her otherwise smooth skin. Upon realization that they were gone, Scarlett jerked her head trying to determine the extent to which her cleavage was lost. The only thing such an act did was rock her body back and forth, which began to spin her frame like a top.

Her movement was becoming increasingly limited, the slightest whims no longer possible. The fact she could still wave her neck was a small commodity she knew she needed. Taking advantage of the momentum, she rocked her head to keep her body swirling, her front starting to dip down, helping improve her view. Unfortunately her Mr. Salt was the first thing she saw. Not the prettiest sight, but it’s better than my ugly body right now. All she had to do was keep rocking her head and she could achieve a small victory. Now she could see more of the group, the top of Violet’s head the last thing she saw as her body curved back around.

What is going to happen next?
12211111112111121111111121121221.title: She's not?  How can she get any bigger!?

122111111121111211111111211212211.content:
“Just a few more turns,” she said with glee, finally something was going right for her, at least until she reached 21 feet in diameter. At this width, her body spread to what limited space remained, which included her neck. Scarlett felt her movement begin to slow, her neck disappearing into body and depriving her of the one freedom she still had. “No, no, I’m so close,” she cried. “Don’t give out on me, don’t give out on me.” It was too late, her neck started to sink into its own divot. She could feel the momentum being lost as her body slowed its teetering returning it to her upright position, unable to see anything but the unwelcome sight of factory steel.

“WONKAAAAAAA! I CAN’T MOVE MY HEAD!” she screamed. “Get this juice out of me now, or I swear I will sue you’re a-ooooooommmph,” her words were lost as the juice, flooded into her cheeks. She could feel them pushing out, rounding her face into one mimicking a chipmunk with its cheeks stuffed with nuts. “HMMMMMPPPH, HMMMMMPH,” she muffled as she tried to scream for help.

“Mother, MOTHER, speak to me mother,” Violet cried at the sudden loss of words. Although much larger, Scarlett had done an adequate job at screaming her thoughts from 22 feet high. Yet now she couldn’t hear a single word escape her mother’s lips. Violet tried to keep herself calm and strong, but the silence was just the icing on the horrible cake this situation was becoming. If only she had help, but the crowd was enjoying the silence.

Meanwhile, Scarlett continued to scream from high up, hoping someone would understand her mumbled words. So much had been lost in such a short span of time, and all from a tiny piece of gum. She had no idea how big she was, but she was sure the number wasn’t good. In all honesty she was a little relieved that she was this high up, unable to hear Mike’s estimates and comments about her size. Scarlett tried to keep herself calm, breathing heavily through her nose while wiggling her fingers and toes. Slowly the view of the factory was lost, her head being pulled further down, as her body formed a basin for it to settle in. Already she could feel her cheeks touching the sides of her skin, their puffed up texture slightly sore from the sudden cramming of juice. It didn’t matter; the more painful thing was watching her vision become clouded with her blue skin, as her head was pulled further in.

A few more surges took place before the pushing ceased, leaving Scarlett a whopping 25 feet in diameter. Everyone looked up in awe at the blue boulder that was once Scarlett Beauregarde. The group turned their attention to Violet who stood in shock at the sight where her mother’s head was last seen. No one spoke; giving her the time she needed to cope with the events that had just transpired. The boastful champion said nothing, unable to process everything that happened.

How could this happen? Today was supposed to be another victory for our family. Yet now my mother is a giant blueberry, a mere shell of her former glory. Such an embarrassing sight seeing her mother like this, but Violet figured that Scarlett was figuring much worse at the moment. While hate and disgust coursed through her mind at such a weak figure, Violet also felt a bit sorry for her mentor. She should have felt ashamed of her self for such feelings, but she was sure that her mother had felt the same way on numerous occasions. However, Violet had never inflated into a fruit girl either, and had the roles been switched, was certain that Scarlett would have practically disowned her. Violet could not even begin to imagine what her mother had felt, nor did she want to.

In her stupor she didn’t hear Mr. Wonka sneak up. The inventor had completed his observations on Mrs. Bearuegarde, and compiled the data on his beautiful specimen. Not once had any victim grown this size, nor had he ever expected the body to obtain such feats. Much more work needed to be done before he could begin applying his information, hours of intense studying were in the near future. Before any of that could take place though, Mrs. Beauregarde had to be juiced. Surely her body had been reached with this last growth spurt, most likely in dire need of relief. Yet the Loompas he had recruited for her first rolling were too few at the moment, more would be needed for her current size. First he would need to make sure her daughter understood what she was doing.

“I’ve never had anyone turn into a blueberry this big,” he said startling Violet.

She turned with an outrageous look in her eye as she said, “I can’t have a blueberry as a mother. What am I supposed to do with her now?”

“You could put her in a county fair,” said Veruca with glee, happy to take another shot at the Beauregardes.

Violet glared at Veruca, arms ready to put a palm strike right between the English brat’s eyes. She needed to be put in her place, but Mr. Wonka wouldn’t approve of such barbaric rituals. Her vengeance would have to wait.

“Mr. Wonka what are we going to do?” Violet asked with pleading eyes.

“I told you Ms. Beauregard we are going to roll her down to the juicing room post haste,” he said with sincerity. “Even quicker now that she’s this big!”

“Why?”

“She has to be squeezed immediately before she explodes,” he said.

“Explodes!!!!!!!” she yelled in alarm. She wasn’t sure if her mother heard her outburst, but if she did, she would have been panicking. “We can’t let that happen, we’ve got to… we’ve got to…”

“Juice her,” Wonka finished. “I agree, luckily it’s a fairly simple operation.”

“What are you waiting for? she screamed.

“More help.” Wonka turned from her and screamed out with his tongue flapping “Whooo whoooo whooooo” the cry fading down the dark corridors of the room. No response came, the only sounds outside of the background factory noise was the gurgling of the juice inside Mrs. Beauregarde. Wonka’s idiotic call had done nothing but given them reason to mock him again, another failure to be added to the list. Even now he just stood there staring around the room, as if he was caught up in his own fantasy, silently ignoring the situation around him.

Violet broke that silence. “What did that do?” she asked with annoyance.

“You’ll see,” he said with a smirk.

Violet had had enough! Wonka’s ambiguous wording had breached her patience, heating up her anger to a level that would no longer be contained. A swift karate kick to the shins would surely get a response; though most likely get her disqualified from the contest. She didn’t care though; it was time to show him who was boss, especially being in the perfect position to strike.

Fortune smiled on her though, as a steam valve expelled vaporous water into the air, relieving the associate machine’s pressure in the process. Another followed close behind it, and then another as they built up into a random array of noises, or at least they thought it was random. A pattern soon formed, turning into a beat with a toe tapping rhythm. Another sound echoed across the room, joining the steam and becoming a composition that sounded as if steam punk had met up with the blue man group. As the music picked up, a wave of smoke flooded out from the machines, shadows forming with the white cloud as something approached. From the artificial mist came more Loompas in black jumpsuits, walking in sync with the beat as if they were dancing. Could it be?
122111111121111211111111211212211.title: Keep going Mrs. B, you're almost there.

choices: Sorry Violet no one will help you, you're out of here.
"I'll take her!"
1221111111211112111111112112122111.content:
Yeah,” they began as they surrounded her swollen mother, some on the ground while others positioned themselves on the catwalks above. They began the dance, extending their arms out as the singing started:

“Listen close and don’t forget, the tale of awful Ms. Scarlett, this soccer mom she was so dumb, chewing, chewing, chewing, chewing, chewing, chewing three course gum.”They crisscrossed their legs and jumped into a twirl as they bridged to the chorus.

“Chewing, chewing, that darn gum! Greedy, stubborn, and so dumb! Chewing, Chewing that darn gum!” They began a chorus line, where they started to roll their arms, transitioning into a wave of their hands before they lifted their hands in a fist pump. “Yeah!”

Violet looked up at them with hate, ready to bore through the cocky Loompas as they continued singing whimsically around her mother. They were trouncing on their pride to the ground without so much as a second thought. Wonka was even getting into the music as he put his hands together and began to do the wave motion, a smile filling his face the whole time.

As the music continued, a group of fifteen Oompa Loompas had worked their way behind Scarlett, arranging themselves into an ordered line. They braced their hands on her mother’s backside, nodding to each other before uniformly pushing against her. Her skin was tight, but had a little give as they applied the force, trying with all their might to get the woman to roll. Slowly her body moved, making headway towards the inventing room’s entrance, though at the rate they were going, it would take them hours. Violet would have called this out, but she was too angry to speak. Nor did she know the Loompas were already forming a new plan.

“Oompa Loompa, Oompa Loompa, Oompa Loompa,” they cried out as a number of them jumped off the catwalks on to the top of her mother, carefully avoiding the divot that was her head. They bounced, and flipped through the air, using her elastic like skin as a trampoline as they positioned themselves across the landscape she had become. In time to the beat, they started to walk in unison, their pleated foot steps working in tangent to the Loompas pushing, creating a unified push that picked up the pace. A few of them even twirled and danced, as they continued the work at hand.

Scarlett was furious at them walking on her, treating her with such little respect when she was the strong woman that she was. Her view was still filled with blue, but looking up she could see one of the little workers occasionally before dipping towards the surface. “She challenged Wonka this is true, what happened next… well she turned blue. He tried to tell her to just spit, and take care of her Vi-O-Let!”

They continued to sing, most of the Loompas aiding the rolling of Mrs. Beauregarde, while the others continued to dance on the catwalks in glee. As the chorus began again, they returned to the same movement they had done earlier, the chorus line of twirling hands “Chewing, chewing, that darn gum, greedy, stubborn, and so dumb, chewing, chewing, that darn gum!” Scarlett’s head was at the floor she panicked and let out a muffled groan as she nearly banged her head against the cold ground. Surprised wails escaped her as her hair traced the floor, moving like a mop over the filthy surface before she started to rise. Angry mmmphs escaped her, but they fell on deaf ears as the Loompas continued their mission.

Oompa Loompa, Oompa Loompa, Oompa Loompa,” “came the cries again as five more Loompas jumped off the catwalk and formed a pyramid. Their formation lasted seconds, before they disassembled and spread across Scarlett, adding extra manpower that was greatly appreciated. The pace was picking up, Mrs. Bearuegarde would be at the entrance soon.

“Tried to relive her glory days, through competing with her baby,” Scarlett screamed a blood-curdling cry as she made another cycle. Her body was moving so fast now, her head whirling with dizziness from the tremendous G forces she was experiencing as she spiraled uncontrollably without any direction or purpose. Her vision was filled with rushing images, her eyes unable to get a fixation on anything as she continued to roll through the factory.

Always wanting to win the prize, reward today increase in size, and that’s why we beg don’t forget, the awful tale of Ms. Scarlett.” “ As they sang the last verse, Scarlett’s head came back into view, a moan of dizziness escaping her as the world around her continued to spin. Slowly the Loompas ceased their steps, a few flipping off her body to land a few feet in front of her to bring her body to rest. Slightly turning her, the groups worked together to push her closer to the door. Their firm presses made Scarlett yelp in surprise as she yelled out, “Wetsss it bucckhhhmp therrr!” Her words were mangled, the juice in her cheeks leaving her plump lips essentially useless to communicate with the world around her.

“Chewing, chewing that darn gum, greedy, stubborn and so dumb, chewing, chewing that darn gum.” The Loompas chorus started to fade, the last of the chorus leaving as Wonka continued to dance, enjoying the melody that his workers had come up with.

The group watched his awkward display, still showing glances towards Scarlett who was rolled in front of the exit door. Wonka continued to dance, not noticing there looks, until Violet walked in front of him, annoyance filling her face with those wide eyes. Despite her small size, Wonka sensed she was not having a good time and halted his little fun, turning his attention to her with a besmirched look.

“What was that all about?” she asked, her nose flaring a little bit from the exasperation.

“That was another great Loompa song,” he said with pride.

“They already sang! Why would they need to do it again?” asked Mike with an obvious tone in his voice.

“Because that was the second group, and they didn’t get to sing little mumbler, and here at my factory, singing is quite welcome.”

“I don’t care about equality in song and dance numbers Mr. Wonka,” Violet cried out, “I want to know what they are doing with my mother.”

“They’re going to roll her onto the boat and take her to the juicing room. I thought we had already discussed this.”

Had Violet been the one about to chew the gum, I would expect her mother to stop her, and if not both would be escorted for their negligence. 12211111112111121111111121121221112.content:
Violet turned to the group wondering if they would accept her as their temporary child. Of course they wouldn’t, this was a competition, and her mother’s folly had now placed her position on this tour in jeopardy. Her hopes of winning were pretty much gone.

Mr. TeeVee had no interest in taking her. Mike and her had not hit it off, and he knew his son’s temper would make adding her a real headache. The Beauregarde girl’s temper and her training surely gave her the ability to cause great harm to he and his son. He wasn’t a strong man in any sense, and his ability to discipline was incredibly weak. It was no wonder, that Mike was such a rotten kid, his lack of strict obedience driving his son into the vandal he was becoming.. If he couldn’t handle his own son, there was no way he could discipline someone else’s child.

Mr. Salt on the other hand was seriously considering the option. Scarlett was all about her little champion, using her daughter as a tool to obtain trophies and awards in the name of her family. This competition was surely an important event to her, and her foolish mistake of chewing the gum had led to this… unexpected consequence. However, Wonka’s loophole could give him a chance to score points with the former blonde, perhaps increasing his odds enough to have an evening with her. A looming dread settled on his mind about his wife finding out about such an affair made him shiver, but the daft woman would most likely be too deep in booze to care. What about Veruca? Truth be told his spoiled princess would not shed a tear, so long as she continued to get what she wanted. He could see the rivalry developing between the two girls, the alpha female syndrome already settling in as to which girl would stand on top. The mock friendship between the two was merely a ploy, both attempting to call a “truce” until the opportunity presented itself to sabotage the other. Taking on Violet would put too much strain on an already tense situation, that he was to exhausted to handle responsibly.

Violet just stood there no volunteers springing to the mix. She couldn’t blame them, for if she were in their position she would allow a strong competitor, perhaps the best in the room, to leave the tournament. It was the best strategy for their success, the smartest move they had to offer. The only thing was that her elimination from the tour was not her fault, but her mother’s. Thanks to her foolishness, she would be denied her right as the heir to the empire. She sighed as she was about to admit defeat when all of a sudden.

“I’ll do it!”

Her eyes, along with the rest of the group turned to Grandpa Joe. The oldest person on the tour, the one who would most likely struggle with the task of two children, had offered to take the responsibility. Most would think he was senile in taking her in, but Grandpa Joe didn’t care. This tour was a trip back into the most wonderful times in his life, a chance to help a man who had only wanted to bring peace to the world. His heart must have been the most gentle and kindest of the bunch, the ideas of greed, winning, and fame further from his mind. Apparently winning was very important to the young lady, and he would extend his guardianship to giver her a proper chance to win. After all as Mr. Wonka said, it wasn’t her fault her mother didn’t listen. “That is if you will behave,” he said with a smile.

Violet was at a lost for words. This man must have been crazy, he had surely seen her bullying his grandson in the candy room. Why was he being so nice to her? Not once had her parents ever extended such a courtesy to her, especially her mother who was a saint when she own, but a devil when she lost. Did her mother really love her, or did she love her victories? She wasn’t sure. Yet Grandpa Joe had shown her kindness she wanted, a love that somehow had breached her own conscious, planting a seed of uncertainty in her. The choice for her old self was obvious, to take his offer and win this for her family.

Deep down though, she could feel another part of her self, one locked up for so long, trying to take hold. It was her compassionate side, one that was telling her to mimic Grandpa Joe’s sincerity and go with her mother, which she assumed was the other option. Most likely this was another test, a trial of her character to see if she would make the decision that he was looking for. What was the right decision though? What would be the best outcome in the long run for her future and her happiness? Her intuition said to take Grandpa Joe, but this thing deep down was telling her to reconsider and go with her mother on this… journey.

“Ms. Beauregarde,” Wonka said interrupting her thoughts.

“What?” she said startled.

“It’s time for you to decide, we don’t have all day to ponder this thought. Will you take Grandpoe Joe’s offer?”

“What’s the alternative if I don’t?” she asked.

“You are eliminated and are allowed to go with your mother and support her in her juicing excursion. So what will it be?”

Her emotions tangoed inside her, the morals of her nature vs nurture going crazy in her mind. “I choose to…”

info.description:
Hello and Welcome to The First Three, a long-running interactive on the oddball tales of Violet Beauregarde, her mother Scarlett and richie-rich friend Veruca Salt as they navigate a more niche version of the 2005 Wonka experience. From life before the factory to their fates after the fateful encounter, these three can't seem to catch a break from being berries, balloons and more while finding their lives forever changed for the kinky.

For the Major Details of the Story:

This interactive focuses on Violet, Scarlett and Veruca (or some combination thereof) getting blown up or possibly transformed along a rough context of the 2005 Wonka movie. Additionally, the character designs and basis for personality start from here as well, but can be expanded upon. (Legacy content may also retain the original ages of the characters, just so you know.)

For the General Rules and Guidelines:

*Please no Male Inflation or Yaoi. A bit old-school, I know. But it's worked so far and I'm gonna stick with it.

*While there's plenty to explore in Inflation, there are a few related (and unrelated) fetishes that aren't going to be in here. Please refrain from using: Weight Gain, Pregnancy, Vore, ABDL, Futa, Animal/Plant/Mineral/Some Object TFs, Watersports and Bodily Fluids, Rape, and Inflation of the extremities (Head, Hands, Feet, Uber, etc). Such chapters are excessively liable for deletion.

*While you can certainly have a good cartoony pop (and respawn), please refrain from killing anyone or using hardcore popping.

*Yuri is an element/area of appeal to this interactive, but please don't feel obligated to it.

*If you're ever unsure about adding something, feel free to shoot me an email. I'm more than happy to discuss anything on your mind for a story.

Beyond these points, it's an open exploration of these three Wonka ladies and their kinky antics. Please enjoy yourself and read/write on! The world is your oyster (or blueberry, as it were).

And a heartfelt thank you to everyone who's been a reader or writer of this series.It truly means a lot to me that what once started as a small experiment with unusual content has become a small hotbed for blueberry fun and Beauregarde appreciation.

**Disclaimer**

As the Owner of the Interactive, I do hold the ability to remove or edit entries that are not within or meet the guidelines as noted above. Such entries may be subject to edits for compliance or deletion depending on the situation. I appreciate your understanding in this and am happy to work with you if you feel a deletion may have been unjustified.

Change Log

V1.0.0 - ~Oct, 2012 - The original launch of the project.

V1.0.3 - 07/30/13 - Expanded what fetishes were allotted for use. Loosened restrictions of language for Yuri content.
